El sueño es poderse comprar una casa para poder vivir tranquilos sin preocuparse de los arriendos.
En los tiempos libres le gusta salir de paseo con los padres.
texts.en:
Ramón Isidoro is 43 years old. He is single and has no children. He lives with a brother in the Chillanes canton, Bolívar province.

The Unión y Progreso la Colombia Baja communal bank is made up of fifteen members and is located 90 minutes from the cooperative. This bank is dedicated to agricultural activity, such as the planting of cacao, rice, corn, soy, plantains, oranges, etc.  

Ramón is a farmer. He plants cacao, rice, soy, and oranges. He does his buying and selling in San José del Tambo every weekend.
He is asking for the loan to be able to buy seed, fertilizer, and materials for his crops and also to invest in the purchase of pigs to raise and sell.  
This loan will help him to meet his financial needs and face frequent challenges such as competition and pests. 

His dream is to be able to live without having to worry about rent. In his free time, he likes to go on outings with his parents.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer, and materials for his crops and also to invest in the purchase of pigs to raise.

loans.name: Jorge Ignacio

texts.es:
Jorge Ignacio tiene 33 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos vive con dos hermanos en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de  Bolívar.

La VRC Unión y Progreso la Colombia baja, está conformada por quince integrantes y está ubicada a 90 minutos de la cooperativa esta ventanilla se dedica a Actividades Agrícolas, siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz, Soya plátano, naranja, etc.

Jorge  se dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de cacao arroz, maíz, soya, naranja, las compras y las ventas lo realiza en San José del Tambo cada fin de semana.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, insumos, urea para los cultivos.  

 Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprarse una casa grande para vivir con la familia.
En los tiempos libres le gusta salir de paseo por el campo.
texts.en:
Jorge Ignacio is 33 years old. He is single and has no children. He lives with two brothers in the Chillanes canton, Bolívar province.

The Unión y Progreso la Colombia Baja communal bank is made up of fifteen members and is located 90 minutes from the cooperative. This banks is dedicated to agricultural activity, such as the planting of cacao, rice, corn, soy, plantains, oranges, etc.

Jorge is a farmer. He plants cacao, rice, corn, soy, and oranges. He does his buying and selling in San José del Tambo every weekend. He is asking for the loan to buy seed, fertilizer, materials and urea for his crops. 

The support of the loan will help him to meet his financial needs and face challenges such as pests and disease and changes in the weather. His dream is to buy a big house to live in with his family. In his free time, he likes to go on outings in the countryside.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer, materials and urea.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
Lucila tiene 54 años es una mujer fuerte. Ella está casada con Juan, su esposo desde hace 15  años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos, pero solo viven con 3 de ellos en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de San Pedro de Cajas. Su situación económica es muy compleja. A pesar de su avanzada edad, ella continúa laborando para el cuidado de sus hijos, quienes aún se encuentran estudiando. Además cuenta que su esposo está delicado de salud, por lo que tiene que cuidarlo. Su principal actividad es una pequeña tienda de comestibles donde vende productos de primera necesidad. A la vez teje chompas de lana de diferentes colores y tamaños. Los mismos que vende a los comerciantes que la visitan constantemente. “Me duele mucho los huesos”, afirma mientras comenta que tiene la enfermedad de osteoporosis; por lo que no puede trasladarse con facilidad. Pero a pesar de los problemas que tiene, continúa trabajando para el futuro de sus hijos a quienes desea brindarles la educación y calidad de vida que se merecen.  Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Telarmachay” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para continuar con sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. 
Lucila de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varias madejas de lana para sus tejidos. Además de insumos necesarios de primera necesidad para su tienda de comestibles.
texts.en:
Lucila is 54 years old and she is a strong woman. She is married to Juan, her husband of 15 years. They have 4 children together but only 3 of them live with them. They own their home and it is located in the locality of San Pedro de Cajas. Her financial situation is very complicated. Despite her advanced age, she continues to work for the support of her children. They are still in school. Additionally, her husband is has health issues and she needs to take care of him. Her primary activity is a small grocery store, selling basic consumer goods. Concurrently she knits wool sweaters in various colors and sizes. She sells them to the merchants who visit her constantly. "It's hard on my bones", she affirms when she was commenting on her osteoporosis condition. It is hard for her to move around. But despite her problems she continues to work for the sake of her children's future. She wants to provide them with an education and the quality of life that they deserve. She is a member of the communal bank "Telarmachay" and this is her second loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner). She hopes to receive the support from each of you to continue on with her objectives. She promises to be on time with her loan payments. 

Upon receiving her support, Lucila will invest the funds requested in the purchase of several skeins of wool for her knitting projects. She will also purchase basic consumer goods for her grocery store.

loans.use: to purchase skeins of wool and basic consumer goods to supply her store.

loans.name: Maria Del Socorro

texts.es: María Del Socorro se dedica a brindar el servicio de taller de costura. Hace más de 40 años que posee este negocio. Ella es propietaria y administradora de su negocio que está ubicado en su vivienda, en el cual confecciona todo tipo de prendas de vestir. Inicio desde muy joven este negocio, mediante su Mama quien anteriormente se hacía cargo de la actividad. Ahora María solicita este crédito con el fin de invertir en materia prima como telas, hilos, tijeras entre otros productos.
texts.en: Maria Del Socorro provides seamstress services. She has had her business for more than 40 years. She is the owner and administrator of her business which is located in her house. She produces all types of clothing. She started out her business when she was very young and her mother previously had the business. Maria requests a loan with the goal of investing in materials such as fabrics, thread, scissors and other products.

loans.use: to purchase fabrics, thread, scissors and other products.

loans.name: Justo

texts.es: Justo, de 53 años, convive con Domitila su esposa. Ambos tuvieron 2 hijos: Roxana y Viviana. En unión familiar ellos viven en una casa alquila, ubicada en la localidad de San Pedro de Cajas. Este hombre hábil y emprendedor; genera sus ingresos en el oficio de artesano, que desde los 18 años hasta hoy practica. Sus principales tejidos constan de ponchos y mantas conocidas como “gachacatas”, que sirven para cargar niños en la espalda. Gracias a su dedicación y creatividad, sus tejidos generan grandes pedidos de compradores de las diferentes ciudades del país, los que constantemente visitan su taller, para poder comprarlos. Sus buenas ganancias le permitieron ahorrar y hace tan solo tres años, abrió su propio “grifo”; donde vende combustible a los diferentes autos que llegan a su localidad. Según cuenta le va muy bien pues no existe uno en la zona y los diferentes chóferes lo visitan constantemente. Además agradece el apoyo de su esposa quien cuida a las 50 ovejas que posee. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Telarmachay” y este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde se siente feliz del trabajo realizado en todo este tiempo, “ya aprendí a ahorrar y proyectarme”, afirma. Por ello promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Justo de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios cilindros de combustible para continuar su negocio.
texts.en: Justo is 53 years old and he lives with his wife, Domitila. They have 2 children together: Roxana and Viviana. They live as a family in a house rental located in the locality of San Pedro de Cajas. This capable and enterprising man generates an income as an artisan, an occupation he started when he was 18 and still practices today. His primary knitting projects include ponchos and blankets known as "gachacatas". They are use to carry children on one's back. Thanks to his dedication and creativity his knitting has generated large orders from buyers of different cities in the country. They constantly visit his workshop to make purchases. His considerable profits have permitted him to save money and in only three years' time he was able to open his own dispensary. He sells fuel to cars that come to his locality. He says that it is going very well because there are no gas stations in the region and several drivers visit him constantly. He is thankful for his wife's support because she takes care of their flock of 50 sheep. He is a member of the communal bank named "Telarmachay" and it is his fourth loan with MPF (Kiva Field Partner). He is happy with the work he has accomplished during this time. "I have learned to save money and to focus", he affirms. For this reason he promises to be on time with his loan payments. On receiving his support, Justo will invest the funds he requests in the purchase of several barrels of fuels to support his business.

loans.use: to purchase several barrels of fuel.

loans.name: Los Amigos De Siempre Group

texts.es:
FANNY PAOLA, TIENE 32 AÑOS D. EDAD, TIENE DOS HIJOS MENORES D. EDAD, ELLOS SON SU RAZON PARA SALIR ADELANTE Y PROGRESAR.
HACE CINCO MESES FANNY PAOLA INTEGRA EL GRUPO "LOS AMIGOS D. SIEMPRE"; ELLA SE DEDICA HACE DOS AÑOS A LA VENTA D. PAPEL D. REGALO AL POR MAYOR Y MENOR; INICIÓ COMO AYUDANTE D. SU HERMANO Y LUEGO ÉL LE DEJÓ EL NEGOCIO.
GRACIAS A SU8 TRABAJO HA LOGRADO INDEPENDIZARSE ECONÓMICAMENTE, TENER UNA BUENA  CARTERA D. CLIENTES Y DISTRIBUIR SUS PAPELES D. REGALO TANTO EN LIMA COMO EN  PROVINCIAS.
SU PRÓXIMA MKETA A LOGRAR ES TENER SU PROPIA TIENDA EN UNA ZONA MUY COMERCIAL.
EL PRESTAMO SOCILITADO LO UTILIZARÁ PARA INVERTIR EN MATERIALES PARA PREPARAR SUS PAPELES D. REGALO PARA LA CAMPAÑA NAVID.ÑA.
texts.en:
Fanny Paola is 32 years old.  She has two dependent children who are her reason for getting ahead and making progress in life.

Five months ago, Fanny Paola joined the 'Los Amigos D. Siempre' group.  For two years, she has been selling gift wrap, both wholesale and retail.  She started out as her brother's assistant then he left the business.  Thanks to her work, she has been able to become financially independent.  She has a good customer base and distributes her gift wrap both in Lima and in the provinces.

Fanny Paola's next goal is to own her own store in a very commercial area.

Fanny Paola will use the loan that she has requested to invest in materials for making her gift wrap for the Christmas season.

loans.use: to buy materials for making Christmas gift wrap

loans.name: Rina

texts.es:
Rina es socia del Banco Comunal Solución, tiene 38 años y 3 hijos, es socia de FINCA Peru desde hace 12 años.
Rina tiene una Bodega, antes tenia una tienda pequeña, solo compraba sus productos por docenas, los préstamos recibidos le han ayudado a invertir en su negocio, ha aprendido muchas cosas, recuerda que su esposo antes era muy machista y ahora con todo lo que ella pudo aprender y le pudo enseñar, la relación esta mejor, pudo progresar económicamente y su negocio creció. El préstamo que solicita lo utilizará para comprar abarrotes al por mayor para su tienda como arroz, azúcar y aceite que es lo mas se vende, ahora su meta es poder construir su casa.
texts.en:
Rina is a member of the 'Solución' community bank.  She is 38 years old and has three children.  She has been a member of FINCA Peru for 12 years.

Rina has a grocery store.  She used to have a small store and only bought her products by the dozen.  The loans she has received have helped her to invest in her business.  She has learned a lot.  She recalls that her husband used to be very 'machista' (male chauvinist) but now, with everything that she has been able to learn, she has been able to teach him and their relationship is better.  She has been able to make financial progress and her business has grown.

Rina will use the loan that she has requested to buy groceries wholesale for her store such as rice, sugar and oil which is what she sells the most of.  Her goal now is to build her own home.

loans.use: to buy groceries wholesale for her store such as rice, sugar and oil

loans.name: Eliette Isabel

texts.es: Eliette es estudiante de derecho, el crédito solicitado será para pagar su curso de graduación, y así poder terminar su carrera y obtener su título. Es madre de tres hijos y ellos le inpsiran a seguir adelante y a querer una vida mejor. En algunos años espera poder desempeñarse en una empresa como asesora legal. Eliette es una persona que le gustan los retos, es responsable y tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.
texts.en: Eliette is a law student.  She will use the loan she has requested to cover her graduation expenses so that she can finish her degree course and obtain her degree.  Eliette is the mother of three children who inspire her to get ahead and want a better life.  In a few years time she hopes to be able to work in a company as a legal advisor.  Eliette is a person who enjoys challenges.  She is responsible and has a great desire to get ahead in life.

loans.use: to pay her graduation expenses

loans.name: Jaime Jose

texts.es: Jaime José es un hombre emprendedor de 47 años, su actividad es una panadería. Tiene más de 15 años de poseerla, el negocio es completamente familiar ya que era su familia quien les había enseñado este medio de vida para que el obtuviera un medio de ingreso para mantener a su familia. Jaime tiene 4 hijos de los cuales solamente 2 están bajo su cargo y les enseña a ganarse el pan de cada día. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de harina, huevos, mantequilla, leche, queso, piña, entre otros productos.
texts.en: Jaime José is 47 years old.  He is an entrepreneurial man and his business is running a bakery.  He has owned his bakery for more than 15 years.  The business is entirely a family business as it was his family who taught him this way of life so that he would have a source of income with which to support his own family.  Jaime has four children, only two of whom are in his care, and he teaches them to earn their daily bread.  Jaime will use the loan that he has requested to buy flour, eggs, butter, milk, cheese, pineapple and other products.

loans.use: to buy flour, eggs, butter, milk, cheese, pineapple and other products

loans.name: Marco

texts.es: Marco, de 24 años es un joven estudiante. Vive junto a sus padres en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de San Pedro de Cajas. La mayor parte del año la pasa en la ciudad de Huancayo, donde estudia Ingeniería Química. Le falta muy poco para culminar sus estudios y desarrollarse como un profesional. Pero desde hace años comenzó a generar sus propios ingresos. Teje mantas, tapices y forros para sillones, los cuales comercializa a la ciudad de Cerro de Pasco, donde el frío es intenso, por ello tiene gran demanda. En todo este tiempo logró adquirir 5 telares, con los que realiza su trabajo. Él nunca descansa, ser activo es su principal virtud. Pues de lunes a viernes, estudia mientras que los fines de semana, continúa con su negocio. Paralelo a ello, también se dedica a la crianza de cuyes; hasta el momento tiene 100 ejemplares y para más adelante desea mejorar su granja con animales de raza, para aumentar sus ganancias en la asociación donde está inscrito.  Él pertenece al banco comunal “San pedro de Cajas” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para lograr su objetivo. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Marco de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 4 telares para continuar con sus hermosos tejidos.
texts.en: Marco, a young student, is 24 years old. He lives with his parents in their own home, located in San Pedro de Cajas. He spends the best part of the year in the city of Huancayo where he is studying chemical engineering. He is very close to completing his studies and becoming a professional. However, for years he has been generating his own income. He weaves rugs, carpets and chair covers which he sells in the city of Cerro de Pasco, where the cold is intense and the demand for his products high. In all this time he has managed to acquire 5 looms with which he practices his craft. He never rests, being active is his principal virtue, as from Monday to Friday he studies while at weekends he continues with his weaving business. In addition to all of this, he also breeds guinea pigs; up until now he has 100 exemplars and in the future he wants to improve the farm with pure bred stock so as to increase the profits he makes from the partneship he belongs to. He is a member of the communal bank "San Pedro de Cajas" and this is his second loan with MFP. He hopes that you will all support him so he can achieve his goal. In addition, he promises to be punctual with his repayments. Marco, on receiving your support, will invest the money requested in the purchase of 4 looms to continue making his beautiful fabrics.

loans.use: to buy 4 weaving looms.

loans.name: Meyer

texts.es: Meyer, de 28 años, convive con Yovana, su esposa. Ambos tienen 3 hijos: Jean, Pool y Miaricielo. En unión familiar ellos viven en casa de su tía, ubicada en la localidad de San Pedro de Cajas. Hace tres años que terminó la carrera de ingeniería zootecnia y desde ahí comenzó a asesorar a los habitantes del pueblo donde nació; y del cual se siente feliz por ello, pues los ganaderos de su zona no tienen pérdidas en el cuidado de sus ganados. Le va muy bien en esto, pues hace poco asumió el cargo de gerente de desarrollo social en el gobierno de su localidad, por el constante aporte que brinda en su consultoría. Desde ahí visita los diferentes pueblitos y caseríos para realizar apoyo en sus sembríos y ganados. Además cuenta que desde muy joven, comenzó a tejer junto a su padre; ese oficio lo realiza desde entonces como un pasatiempo. Pero también como un ingreso extra, pues en su pueblo todos son artesanos y como tal su esposa también teje para apoyarlo en los gastos del hogar. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Telarmachay” y este es el tercer crédito con MFP. Como profesional se siente satisfecho de que existan personas, que apoyen a los que necesitan. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Meyer de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una motocicleta para trasladarse durante sus visitas a los agricultores y ganaderos.
texts.en: Meyer, 28 years old, lives with Yovana his wife. They have 3 children: Jean, Pool and Miaricielo. As a family, they live in an aunt's house which is located in San Pedro de Cajas. Three years ago he completed his studies in husbandry engineering and began advising the people of the village where he was born. He feels very happy doing so as the breeders in his area suffer no losses in livestock. He is doing very well with this and recently was appointed manager of social development in his local government due to the continuing contribution he provides with his consulting services. From his location, he visits different towns and villages to provide support and advise on crops and livestock. Also he tells us that from a young age he started weaving with his father. He still practices this craft as a hobby and also as an extra source of income, as in his town everyone is an artisan; his wife also weaves to help with the household expenses. He belongs to the communal bank “Telarmachay” and this is his 3rd loan with MFP. As a professionnal he feels happy that there are people who support those in need. He also promises to be punctual with his repayments. Meyer, on receiving your support, will invest the money requested to purchase a motorcycle in order to visit the farmers and livestock breeders.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es: Juan Bautista tiene 56 años, su actividad es brindar el servicio de taller de talabartería. Hace más de 42 años que se dedica a este medio de vida, el empeño que diariamente Juan realiza en su negocio es admirable pues el realizar este tipo de negocio no es fácil. Inicio con un pequeño negocio que lo aprendió de su padre, ya que anteriormente su papa era el dueño del taller. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de mecates, cuero, baquetas, espuelas, entre otros productos que son necesaR. para la elaboración de sus productos.
texts.en: Juan Bautista is 56 years old. He runs a harness-maker's workshop. He has been doing this for more than 42 years. The effort that Juan exhibits in his business on a daily basis is admirable as to carry out this kind of work is no easy thing. With what he learned from his father, he started out with a small business, in a workshop that had previously belonged to his father. The reason for the loan is to buy ropes, leather, calfskin, spurs and other items needed for the manufacture of his products.

loans.use: to buy ropes, leather, calfskin, spurs, and other products.

loans.name: María Cristina

texts.es:
María es socia del Banco Comunal Solución, tiene 51 años y 7 hijos, esta casada y socia D. FINCA Peru desD. hace un año.
María venD. agregados para construcción, antes se dedicaba a vender verduras en la chacra y ahora gracias a los préstamos que recibió pudo venir a Ayacucho y tener su casita, Finca le ayudó hace un año para poder cambiar D. negocio, el cual ha ido incrementando en ventas, esta muy feliz por todo lo que pudo obtener como socia del Banco Comunal, ahora con el préstamo que solicita comprará arena al por mayor para vender al por menor, a ella le encanta las capacitaciones porque le ayudan a poder cristalizar esta idea D. cambiar D. negocio, también le ayudan a poder ser mejor madre, esposa y negociante.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the “Solución” Communal Bank.  She is 51 years old, and married with 7 children.  She has also been a member of FINCA Peru for one year.
Maria sells construction aggregate (sand, gravel, crushed stone, etc.).  Previously, she sold vegetables at a farm.  Now, thanks to the loans she has received, she was able to come to Ayacucho and buy her home.  For one year, FINCA helped her change her business, which has been experiencing an increase in sales.  She is very happy with everything she has received from the communal bank.  With the current loan she is requesting, she will purchase sand in bulk for resale.  She loves the training because it has helped her crystallize the idea of changing to a new business.  They have also helped her become a better mother, wife, and business woman.

loans.use: ro buy sand in bulk.

loans.name: Maria Marta

texts.es:
La Señora Maria está casada con el señor Sindulfo hace varios años, tienen 4 hijos menores que aún están en la escuela primaria. Juntos montaron una despensa en su casa que está ubicada en un barrio muy poblado D. la zona, se iniciaron con un pequeño capital que consiguieron con otros trabajos que han realizaron anteriormente como asalariados. Gracias al trabajo que estan realizando estan educando a sus hijos y comprando todas las necesidades D. su hogar.
Ella comenta que gracias a su arduo trabajo y sacrificio ella, junto con la ayuda D. su marido ha logrado mantener a u familia. Comenta que tiene muchos clientes que diariamente acuden hasta su local para comprar D. ella.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra D. comestibles, bebidas, lácteos y demás para abastecer su local.
texts.en:
Señora Maria has been married to Señor Sindulfo for several years,  They have four young children who are still in primary school.  Together they set up a store in their home, which is located in a highly-populated neighborhood in the area.  They began with a small amount of capital which they got from other work they had done previously as salaried employees.

Thanks to their work, they are educating their children and buying everything they need for their household.

She comments that thanks to her hard work and self-sacrifice, she has been able to support her family with the help of her husband.  She comments that she has many customers who come to her premises every day to buy from her.

She is requesting the loan for the purchase of food, drinks, dairy products and other things for stocking up her premises.

loans.use: to buy food, drinks, dairy products and other things.

loans.name: Familias Luchadoras Group

texts.es:
EL SR. LUIS ALBERTO TIENE 37 AÑOS DE EDAD, ES CASADO Y TIENE UN PEQUEÑO HIJO. HACE 5 MESES INTEGRA EL GRUPO "FAMILIAS LUCHADORAS" INTEGRADO POR 9 PERSONAS LAS CUALES LO ELIGIERON COMO TESORERO DEL GRUPO.
EL SR. LUIS ALBERTO ES UN HOMBRE EMPRENDEDOR, ADMINISTRA UNA PEQUEÑA BODEGA JUNTO CON SU ESPOSA EN SUS TIEMPOS LIBRES, YA QUE POR LA MAÑANA SE DEDICA A PRESTAR SERVICIO DE MOTOTAXI, HACE MOVILIDAD ESCOLAR, Y POR LAS NOCHES APOYA A SU ESPOSA EN LA ATENCIÓN DE SU CARRITO SANGUCHERO.
EL PRESTAMO SOLICITADO LO INVERTIRÁ EN LA COMPRA DE PRODUCTOS PARA PODER SURTIR SU BODEGA, TANTO EN ABARROTES COMO EN BEBIDAS DE DIFERENTES TIPOS.
DORIS LILIANA FALTO EN LA FOTOGRAFIA POR MOTIVO DE SALUD.
texts.en:
Luis Alberto is 37 years old, married, and has a young son.  He has been a member of the "Familias Luchadoras" group for five months.  The group has eight members who chose him as their treasurer.

Luis Alberto is an entrepreneurial man who, in his free time, runs a small grocery store together with his wife.  In the mornings he provides a motorcycle taxi service, doing the school run.  In the evenings he supports his wife serving on her fast-food cart.

Luis Alberto will invest the loan he has requested in buying products with which to stock his grocery store, both groceries and different types of drinks.

loans.use: to invest in buying products for his grocery store

loans.name: Roberto Carlos

texts.es:
Roberto Carlos tiene 29 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos vive con los hermanos en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de bolívar.

La VRC Unión y Progreso la Colombia baja, está conformada por quince integrantes y está ubicada a 90 minutos de la cooperativa esta ventanilla se dedica a Actividades Agrícolas, siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz, Soya plátano, naranja, etc.

Roberto se dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de cacao arroz, maíz, soya, naranja, las compras y las ventas lo realiza en San José del Tambo cada fin de semana.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, insumos, urea para los cultivos. 
 
 Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es comprarse una casa donde pueda vivir cómodamente.
En los tiempos libres le gusta salir de paseo y visitar a los familiares.
texts.en:
29-year old Roberto Carlos is single and has no children. He lives with his siblings in Ventanas canton, in Bolívar province.

There are fifteen members in his Community Bank which is called the Unión y Progreso la Colombia Baja and is located 90 minutes from the cooperative. The branch deals mainly with agricultural loans for such items as cocoa seedlings, rice, maize, soya, bananas, oranges etc.

Roberto earns his living from the land. He grows cocoa, rise, maize, soya, and oranges which he buys and sells in San José del Tambo each weekend. He is seeking a loan to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, urea, and other supplies for his fields. With the support he receives from this loan, he will be able to buy basic necessities.

The main difficulties Roberto faces are insect infestations and diseases, and the changing climate. His dream is to buy a house for himself where he can live. In his free time, Roberto enjoys going for walks and visiting relatives.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, urea, and other supplies

loans.name: Dalay

texts.es: Dalay, tiene la edad 71 de años, está viuda, vive sola actualmente. Ella con le crédito va comprar los repuestos para la reparación del camión. Ella cuenta con el camión el cual el facilita su trasporte y su trabajo. Con esta mejora de su camión le facilitara su trabajo y así realizar sus trabajos a tiempo. Ella con esta mejora lo que pretende es tener la mayoría de ganancias para su bienestar y así mantener su camión en buen estado para seguir adelante con sus proyectos de vida.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Dalay, is 71 years old. She is a widow and lives alone. She will use this loan to buy spare parts to repair her truck. She relies on her truck as a means of transport and for her work. Carrying out these improvements to her truck will make her work easier and allow her to complete her jobs on time. 

She is doing this so that she can use her earnings to improve her well-being and to keep her truck in good condition so that she can make make progress with her life's projects. 

This is the first loan she has received from Kiva Field Partner, FUDECOSUR. She has not had any loans from state banks before, but FUDECOSUR has offered her a loan with better facilities and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to repair her truck.

loans.name: Wilson Fernando

texts.es:
Wilson Fernando tiene 26 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos vive en el Cnatón Chillanes Provincia Bolívar.
La VRC Unión y Progreso la Colombia baja, está conformada por quince integrantes y está ubicada a 90 minutos de la cooperativa esta ventanilla se dedica a Actividades Agrícolas, siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz, Soya plátano, naranja, etc.
Wilson se dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de cacao arroz, maíz, soya, naranja, las compras y las ventas lo realiza en San José del Tambo cada fin de semana.
Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, insumos agrícolas para  mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.  
 Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. 
El  sueño es comprarse una casa donde pueda vivir y no preocuparse del  arriendo.
En los tiempos libres le gusta a pasear con los amigos y disfrutar de las fiestas de Cantón.
texts.en:
26-year old Wilson Fernando is single and has no children. He lives in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.

There are fifteen members in his Community Bank which is called the Unión y Progreso la Colombia Baja and is located 90 minutes from the cooperative. The branch deals mainly with agricultural loans for such items as cocoa seedlings, rice, maize, soya, bananas, oranges etc.

Wilson earns his living from the land. He grows cocoa, rice, maize, soya, and oranges which he buys and sells in San José del Tambo each weekend. He is seeking a loan to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, and other supplies to keep his fields healthy. With the support he receives from this loan, he will be able to buy basic necessities.

The main difficulties Wilson faces are insect infestations and diseases, and the changing climate.

His dream is to buy a house of his own and not be worried about renting anywhere. In his free time he likes going out with his friends and enjoying the local fiestas.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, and other supplies

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Olga es socia del Banco Comunal Solución, tiene 38 años y 7 hijos, pero ahora solo 5 de ellos están a su cargo, Olga les pudo educar sola, es socia de FINCA Peru desde hace 9 años.
Olga vende gelatina en el Mercado de su localidad, siempre de dedicó a vender gelatina y este pequeño negocio no le ayudaría a educar a sus hijos, es por ello que gracias a los préstamos que recibió sus hijos pudieron estudiar, recuerda que antes para ayudarse tambien vendía papa con huevo y queso, pero un día le robaron todo, con esa decepción ya no quería saber nada, preocupada por sus hijos una amiga la trajo al Banco Comunal, ser socia para ella significa mucho, es como su segunda casa. El préstamo que solicita lo utilizará para poder comprar gelatina y pagar la escuela de sus hijos, el sueño que tiene es poder tener un puesto de especerías.
texts.en:
Olga is a member of the Solución Communal Bank.  She is 38 years old, and she has seven children.  However, only five of them are now under her care.  Olga was able she provide an education for her children by herself.  She has been a member of Finca Peru for nine years.

Olga sells gelatin at the local market.  She has always sold gelatin, but this small business would not help her give her children an education.  That is why; thanks to the loans she received, her children were able to get an education.

She remembers that before, in order be of help, she also sold potatoes with egg and cheese.  One day she was robbed of everything.  With this disappointment she no longer wanted to learn anything.  Worried about her children, a friend took her to the communal bank.  Being a member means a lot to her; it is like her second home.

She will use the loan she is requesting to buy gelatin and to pay for her children’s school.

The dream that she has is to be able to have a stand to sell spices.

loans.use: to buy gelatin.

loans.name: Elizabeth Margarita

texts.es:
Elizabeth es una mujer de 33 años, madre de dos hijos pequeños de 7 y 5 años. Es casada y su esposo trabaja como chofer. El menor de sus hijos está cursando los primeros años de educación primaria. Toda la familia vive en la parroquia de "Chiguilpe" del cantón "Santo Domingo". Santo Domingo es un cantón de la provincia de "Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas" el cual es uno de los más densamente poblados del Ecuador. Tiene un gran atractivo ya que posee varios monumentos distribuidos por toda la ciudad entre el que está el Monumento al Indio Colorado, sector conocido como la “Y del Colorado”. Santo Domingo es un cantón privilegiado, con gente maravillosa, trabajadora y emprendedora, que lucha incansablemente por el desarrollo y progreso, que recibe al turista siempre con los brazos abiertos y los lleva a conocer lo maravilloso de su cultura y entorno. 

Elizabeth vende productos cosméticos. Ella trabaja todo el día, cobrando y vendiendo como ella mismo nos comenta. Cree que lo más de difícil de su trabajo es "convencer al cliente" ya que para ello se necesita mucha experiencia. Elizabeth quiere invertir en mercadería de tal manera que no solo podrá mostrar los productos por catalogo sino que los clientes los podrán verlos realmente. Por esta razón ella acudió a Fundación Alternativa para solicitar un crédito, ya que como ella comenta "le gusta la forma de pago que ofrecen". Ella quiere vender más y así aspirar a un mejor estilo de vida.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is a 33 year old woman.  She has two small children, ages seven and five.  She is married, and her husband works as a driver.  Her youngest child is in the first years of elementary school.  The whole family lives in the Chiguilpe parish in the Santo Domingo canton.  Santo Domingo is a canton in the Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas province, which is one of the most densely populated provinces in Ecuador.  It has a great attraction because it has various monuments throughout the whole city.  Among them is the monument to Indio Colorado, a sector known as Y del Colorado.  Santo Domingo is an exceptional canton with its marvelous, hard-working, and entrepreneurial people who struggle untiringly for development and progress.  They always receive tourists with open arms and take them to learn about the marvelous culture and environment.

Elizabeth sells cosmetic products.  She tells us that she works all day collecting and selling.  She believes the most difficult part of the work is “convincing the customer” because you need a lot of experience to do this.

Elizabeth wants to invest in merchandise in such a way that she would not only be able to show the products by catalog, but that the customers could see the actual products.  That is why she came to Fundación Alternativa in order to request a loan.  She says, “I like the payments terms they offer”.  She wants to sell more and aspires to have a better life style.

loans.use: to buy the merchandise (cosmetics) that she sells.

loans.name: Gongolamboto Group

texts.en:
Jesca, who is in her late 30s, is married with three children who are still going to school. She has been running a charcoal business for four years now.  She works 6 a.m to 8 p.m daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit. 

This will be her 1st loan from Tujijenge Tanzania which she wants to use for buying more sacks of charcoal. Her dream is to one day be able to build her own house. 

She will share this loan with her loan group "Gongolamboto" which has a total of 16 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: To buy more sacks of charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise like clothes, cosmetics, and perfume, etc.

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es:
Humberto es socio del Banco Comunal Solución, tiene 58 años y 6 hijos, pero ahora solo 2 estan a su cargo, es socia D. FINCA Perú desD. hace 10 años.
Humberto tiene una oficina D. inmobiliaria (compra y venta D. casas), también tiene un Internet donD. sacan copias, recuerda que el primer crédito lo utilizó para poder comprar materiales D. escritorio y papel, su tienda era pequeña, siendo socio pudo tener L. Inmobiliaria, y su tienda ahora también es Internet, las capacitaciones le ayudaron mucho, como padre, esposo y negociante, como hombre aprendió muchos valores que le ayudaron a seguir progresando, lo que mas le gusta es que confían en las personas, las capacitaciones. Ahora el préstamo lo utilizará para poder comprar computadoras y materiales D. escritorio. Su meta es poder comprar un carro.
texts.en:
Humberto is a member of the Solución Community Bank. He is 58 years old and has six children, but only two still live at home. He has been a member of FINCA Perú for ten years.

Humberto has a real estate agency (buying and selling houses). He also has an Internet station and makes photocopies. He remembers that he used his first loan to buy office materials and paper for his small store. As a Bank member he was able to obtain his real estate agency. The training programs have helped him as a father, husband, and businessman, and he has learned many worthwhile things which have helped him to make progress. He most enjoys the trust that people place in him and the training programs. 

Now he will use the loan to buy computers and office supplies. His goal is to be able to buy a car.

loans.use: to buy computers and office supplies

loans.name: Magda Grelia

texts.es:
Magda Grelia tiene 37 años de edad es soltera no tiene hijos vive en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC Unión y Progreso la Colombia baja, está conformada por quince integrantes y está ubicada a 90 minutos de la cooperativa esta ventanilla se dedica a Actividades Agrícolas, siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz, Soya plátano, naranja, etc.

Magda  se dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de cacao arroz, maíz, soya, naranja  las compras y las ventas lo realiza en San José del Tambo cada fin de semana.

 Solicita el crédito para poder comprar semillas, abonos e insumos para los cultivos y también invertir en la compra de pollos para la cría y luego venderlos. 

Con la ayuda del préstamo le ayudará a suplir necesidades económicas, Enfrenta desafíos que son muy frecuentes como la competencia y las plagas. 

El sueño es poderse comprar una casa para poder vivir tranquila.
En los tiempos libres le gusta salir de paseo a visitar a los padres.
texts.en:
Magda Grelia, 37, is single with no children.  She lives in Chillanes Canton in the province of Bolívar.

The Unión y Progreso La Colombia Baja Communal Bank has 15 members and is located 90 minutes from the cooperative.  This communal bank is devoted to agricultural work, growing cacao, rice, corn, soybeans, bananas, oranges, etc.

Magda works in agriculture, growing cacao, rice, corn, soybeans, and oranges.  She buys and sells every weekend in San José del Tambo.

She is requesting the loan to be able to buy seeds, fertilizer, and crop supplies, and also to buy chickens to raise and then sell.  The loan will help her supply basic economic needs.  She confronts frequent challenges such as competition and disease.

Her dream is to be able to buy herself a house to be able to live peacefully. In her free time she likes to go out and visit with her parents. 

In her free time she likes to play with the children.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, and crop supplies, and also chickens to raise and then sell.

loans.name: Bequer

texts.es: Bequer, de 20 años es un joven independiente. Vive en una casa alquila en la ciudad de Lima (capital del país). Pero cada mes visita a su mamá en la comunidad de San Pedro de Cajas. Comenzó desarrollando su principal objetivo. Estudiar diseño gráfico publicitario en la capital del país. Hace 4 años comenzó a trabajar en una fábrica textil, ahí aprendió todo lo necesario en este rubro y a su corta edad tienen muchos proyectos y objetivos. En este corto tiempo aprendió todo lo necesario para el mantenimiento de maquinarias pesadas, esto le ayudo a ganar un poco más de dinero, ya que en sus tiempos libres ofrece este servicio a diferentes fábricas de la capital. Ahora comenzó a abrir su propia fábrica textil, ya tienen una máquina de costura recta y muy pronto comprará más maquinarias para poder implementar su pequeño taller. Por el momento realiza polos de todo tamaño y estilo. “El camino es largo”, afirma con optimismo. Pero sabe que con trabajo y esfuerzo lo logrará. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Telarmachay” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde está seguro podrá concretar sus objetivos. Razón por la que promete ser puntual en sus cuotas. Bequer de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una máquina remalladota industrial, que mejorará el tiempo de confección de los polos que elabora.
texts.en:
Bequer, aged 20, is an independent young man.  He lives in a rented house in the city of Lima (the country's capital), however every month he visits his mom in the community of San Pedro de Cajas 

He has begun to develop towards his main goal, and is studying advertising graphic design in the city's capital.  Four years ago, he began working in a textile factory, where he learned everything necessary about this line of work.  Even at his young age, he has many plans and goals for his life.  In the short time he was at the factory, he learned everything necessary about heavy machinery maintenance, which has helped him to learn a little more money as in his free time he offers this service to different factories in the capital.

He has now started the process of opening his own textile factory, as he has a sewing machine and will very soon be buying more machines to set up his small workshop.  For now, he is making polo-shirts in every size and style.

"The road is long", he states with optimism.  But he knows that with hard work and effort, he will achieve what he sets out to do.

He belongs to the "Telarmachay" communal bank, and this is his second loan with MFP.  He is sure he will be able to achieve his objectives, and this is why he promises to be punctual in his repayments.

On receiving the support, Bequer will invest the requested money in purchasing an industrial sewing machine, which will reduce the time it takes him to make his polo-shirts.

loans.use: to buy an industrial sewing machine.

loans.name: José Edilberto

texts.es:
Don José tiene 46 años de edad, vive con su compañera de vida y tres hijos.

El señor José desde muy pequeño inicio a trabajar en el campo, su papá fue quien le enseño el trabajo de la agricultura. Él siembra maíz y maicillo, se levanta a la 4:30 de la mañana a ordeñar una vaca, luego desayuna para irse al trabajo, debe caminar 30 minutos a pie hasta llegar al lugar donde tiene sus cultivos y de esta manera aprovecha trabajar 8 horas diarias.

Para poder cultivar don José tiene que adquirir insumos como fertilizantes, para que su cosecha se ha buena, estos los compra  en un pueblo del oriente del país, para ello debe caminar unos 30 minutos a pie desde su casa hasta el lugar donde los compra, a veces el aborda una mototaxi para llegar mas rápido y le toma unos 10 minutos.

El señor José utilizara el préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas como abono y veneno para su cultivo, ya que tiene sembrado una manzana y media de maicillo y esta necesita los nutrientes para producir buenos frutos. Él desea obtener una mejor producción y que sea abundante, ya que de esta manera obtendrá mejores ganancias. De esta manera don José podrá tener una seguridad económica y le brindara un mejor futuro a su familia, enviando a sus hijos a estudiar.

El sueño de don José es que sus hijos se gradúen en la Universidad y que no tengan que trabajar como él de fuerte. Desea que ellos tengan una mejor vida y un mejor futuro para sus familias.
texts.en:
Don José is 46 years old and lives with his life companion and three children.

Señor José started working in the fields when he was very young, and was taught the business of agriculture by his father.  He grows corn and millet, rising at 4:30 in the morning to milk a cow.  After breakfast, he must walk 30 minutes to get to where he has his crops, and once there he works an 8 hour day.

To be able to grow his crops, Don José has to purchase supplies such as fertilizers in order to have a good harvest.  He buys these supplies in a village in the east of the country, which is a 30 minute walk from his home.  Sometimes he will take a mototaxi to get their quicker, which takes about 10 minutes.

Señor José will use the loan to buy agricultural supplies such as manure and poison for his crops, as he is planting a block and a half of millet, and needs these nutrients to products good crops.  He wants to improve his production and have it be abundant, as in this way he will get better earnings.  In this way Don José will be able to have financial security and provide a better future for his family, and will be able to send his children to school.

Don José's dream is for his children to graduate from university, and for them not to need to work as hard as he does.  He wants them to have a better life and future for their own families.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies for growing millet.

loans.name: Aquilina

texts.es:
Aquilina es socia del Banco Comunal Solución, tiene 55 años, es socia del FINCA Peru desde hace 5 años.
Aquilina, trabaja en la chacra en Compañía, ahora sembró alfalfa y vainita, recuerda que el primer crédito lo utilizó para poder comprar semillas e insecticidas, ahora las lluvias que hubo dañaron su chacra, de nuevo esta resurgiendo, le encanta las capacitaciones porque le ayudan a poder mejorar su negocio y como administrarlo, este préstamo lo invertirá, en la compra de semillas y abono para su siembra, la meta que tiene es poder construir su casa.
texts.en:
Aquilina is a member of the "Solución" ("Solution") communal bank.  She is 55 years old, and has been a member of FINCA Peru for the last five years.

Aquilina works on a farm in Compañía, she is currently growing alfafa and string beans.  She recalls that her first loan was used to buy seeds and insecticides.  Now that the rains have damaged her farm, she is starting up again.  

She loves the trainings because they help her to improve her business and teach her how to manage it.

This loan will be invested in buying seeds and manure for her planting.  Her goal is to be able to build a home for herself.

loans.use: to buy seeds and manure for her planting.

loans.name: Greta Yolanda

texts.es:
Greta Yolanda tiene 43 años de edad es soltera no tiene hijos vive sola en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia Bolívar.
La VRC Unión y Progreso la Colombia baja, está conformada por quince integrantes y está ubicada a 90 minutos de la cooperativa esta ventanilla se dedica a Actividades Agrícolas, siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz, Soya plátano, naranja, etc.
Greta  se dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de cacao arroz, maíz, soya, naranja, las compras y las ventas lo realiza en San José del Tambo cada fin de semana.
 Solicita el crédito para poder comprar semillas, abonos e insumos para los cultivos y también invertir en la compra de cerdos para la cría y luego venderlos. 
Con la ayuda del préstamo le ayudará a suplir necesidades económicas, Enfrenta desafíos que son muy frecuentes como la competencia y las plagas. 
El sueño es poderse comprar terrenos para poder sembrar cacao y comprar insumos, abonos, fertilizantes.
En los tiempos libres le gusta salir a visitar a los padres.
texts.en:
Greta Yolanda is 43 years old.  She is single and doesn't have any children.  She lives alone in Chillanes canton, in Bolívar province.

The 'Unión y Progreso la Colombia Baja' community bank has fifteen members and is located 90 minutes from our cooperative.  The members of this bank work in agriculture, growing cacao, rice, corn, soy, bananas, oranges, etc.

Greta is a farmer who grows cacao, rice, corn, soy and oranges.  She makes her purchases and sales in San José del Tambo every weekend.

Greta is requesting this loan to buy seeds, manure and supplies for her crops.  She will also invest in buying pigs to raise and then sell.

The support of this loan will help Greta to financially cover her needs.  She faces very frequent challenges in the form of competition and pests.

Greta's dream is to buy land so that she can sow cacao.

In her free time, Greta enjoys going to visit her parents.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure and supplies for her crops, and to buy some pigs to raise

loans.name: Luzmila

texts.es: Luzmila, D. 54 años es una mujer trabajadora. Está casada con Pascual, su esposo. Ambos tienen 6 hijos, pero solo viven con uno D. ellos, a quien cuidan y educan en su casa propia ubicada, en la localidad D. San pedro D. Cajas. En el pueblo la mayoría D. sus habitantes se dedican a la artesanía y el arte; pero muy pocas personas como Luzmila, encontraron éxito en otros campos D. desarrollo. Ella cuenta que hace 35 años, abrió una panadería y desD. ese entonces todo le va muy bien, la mayoría D. sus habitantes compran panes y pasteles en su negocio. Todos la conocen como esposa D. “pashquito”, como le dicen a su esposo D. cariño. Según cuenta cada día tiene nuevos clientes. Pero como en su sangre corre el gusto por el arte, ella también se dedica al tejido y bordado; sus 20 años D. experiencia se refleja en su tienda D. artesanía en el parque central D. la localidad. DonD. venD. sus principales tejidos, en épocas festivas llega a obtener buenas ganancias. Ahora ella quiere abrir su panadería en diferentes lugares, pero por el momento tendrá que esperar, pues su esposo se encuentra delicado D. salud. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Telarmachay” y este es el quinto crédito con MFP,  donD. se siente agradecida por su apoyo. Por ello promete ser puntual en el pago D. sus cuotas. Luzmila D. recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra D. harina para la elaboración D. sus ricos panes. Asimismo en la compra D. lana D. diferentes texturas y colores para realizar sus tejidos.
texts.en:
54-year-old Luzmila is a hard-working woman.  She is married to Pascual.  The couple have six children but only live with one of them.  They care for their child and educate him in their own home, which is in the village of San Pedro D. Cajas.  Most of the people who live in their village make handicrafts and create works of art.  However, a few people such as Luzmila found success in other fields of endeavor.

Luzmila tells us that 35 years ago she opened a bakery and, since then, everything has gone very well.  Most of the people in her village buy their bread and cakes from her.  They all know her as Pashquito's wife as this is what they affectionately call her husband.  She tells us that she has new customers every day.  However, as she has a love of art in her blood, she also knits and embroiders.  Her 20 years of experience are reflected in the craft store that she has in the central park in her village.  This is where she sells most of her knitted products.  During holiday seasons, she makes good profits.  Luzmila would like to open her bakery in different places.  However, this will have to wait as her husband is currently experiencing poor health.  

Luzmila belongs to the 'Telarmachay' community bank and this is her fifth loan from MFP.  She feels grateful for their support.  For this reason, she pledges to make her repayments on time.  With your support, Luzmila will invest the money she has requested in buying flour for making her delicious breads.  She will also buy yarn in different textures and colors to carry out her knitting work.

loans.use: to buy yarn in different textures and colors

loans.name: Alejandra

texts.es:
Alejandra es socia del Banco Comunal Solución, tiene 40 años y 3 hijos, es casada, es socia de FINCA Peru desde hace 3 años.
Alejandra vende agregados para construcción (piedra chancada, arena fina, arena de asentar, hormigón y mas), recuerda que cuándo empezó no tenía mucho capital y no le querían dar préstamo en ningún Banco, ella agradece que Finca confió en ella y gracias a eso ahora esta progresando, el apoyo moral que dan, con las capacitaciones tiene mucho valor parar ella, ahora gracias a su esfuerzo y la responsabilidad que le enseñaron pudo salir adelante. Con este préstamo comprará arena y hormigón. Su meta es poder construir su casa.
texts.en:
Alejandra is a member of the 'Solución' community bank. She is 40 years old, married, and has three children.  She has been a member of FINCA Peru for three years.

Alejandra sells construction aggregates (gravel, fine sand, mortar, concrete, etc.)  She recalls that when she started out she didn't have a lot of capital and none of the banks wanted to give her a loan.  She is grateful that FINCA trusted her and, thanks to this, she is now making progress.  She finds the moral support that FINCA provides and the training sessions they give to be of great value.  Now, thanks to her hard work and the responsibility that they have taught her, she has been able to get ahead in life.  She will use this loan to buy sand and concrete.  Her goal is to be able to build a house.

loans.use: to buy sand and concrete

loans.name: Rocio

texts.es: Rocío de 19 años, vive con su mamá y sus 6 hermanos, a los que quiere y aprecia. Y juntos viven en la localidad de San Pedro de Cajas. Está joven señorita, hábil y con mucho futuro. Estudia en el instituto de bellas artes de su localidad, donde está aprendiendo a pintar hermosos cuadros, pues el arte lo lleva en las venas, ya que su familia se dedica a la artesanía. Según cuenta le falta 2 años para culminar sus estudios; pero desde ahora pinta hermosos cuadros al óleo; los cuales comercializa a buen precio. Además de dedicarse al bordado de disfraces, faldas y manteles. Ya tienen dos años emprendiendo su propio negocio y según afirma le va muy bien y cada día tienen más pedidos. Ahora ella quiere trabajar muy duro, para expandir su negocio y juntar el dinero necesario para poder estudiar la carrera de gastronomía, pues es otro de sus sueños. Como también desarrollar el arte del dibujo. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Telarmachay” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde está segura logrará concretar sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Rocío de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de telas, hilos de colores, blondas y demás accesorios para la elaboración de los 25 disfraces que tiene como pedido.
texts.en:
19-year-old Rocío lives with her mom and her 6 siblings who she loves and is fond of.  They live together in the town of San Pedro de Cajas.  This young lady is talented and has a good future ahead of her.

Rocío is currently studying at the Institute of Fine Arts in her town where she is learning to paint beautiful pictures.  She has art in her blood as her family are craftspeople.  She tells us that she has two years left until she finishes her studies but she already paints beautiful oil paintings which she sells for a good price.  In addition, she also embroiders costumes, skirts and tablecloths.  She has been working in her own business for two years.  She says that it is doing very well and that she has more and more orders every day.  Now she would like to work very hard in order to expand her business and get together the money she needs to study for a degree in cookery as this is another of her dreams.  She also wants to develop her skills in the art of drawing.

Rocío belongs to the 'Telarmachay' community bank and this is her second loan from MFP.  She is certain that she will manage to achieve her goals and she pledges to make her loan repayments on time.  With your support, Rocío will invest the money she has requested in buying fabric, colored threads, lace and other accessories to make 25 costumes that she has orders for.

loans.use: to buy fabric, colored threads, lace and accessories to make 25 costumes

loans.name: Yath

texts.fr: Monsieur Yath est un tailleur de 40 ans  qui vit au Sénégal  dans un quartier communautaire  non loin de l’un des guichets  de l’U-IMCEC ou il est membre depuis aout 2007. Il est marié et père  de 8 enfants dont l’âge  varie entre 1 et 12 ans. Il  coud essentiellement des modèles  de femmes et pratique cette activité depuis plus de 30 ans. Il a choisi cette activité par passion et surtout par recommandation de ses parents. Il éprouve beaucoup de plaisir pour le travail bien fait et la création de nouveautés. Il a déjà remboursé 2 crédits antérieurs et sollicite un prêt de 500 000 frs prévu pour le réaménagement et la finition de son atelier de couture. Il souhaite rentabiliser davantage son activité, accroitre ses revenus et améliorer les conditions de vie sociale de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mr. Yath is a 40-year-old tailor who lives in Senegal in a community not far from a U-IMCEC branch where he has been a member since August 2007.  He is married and the father of eight children, from 1 to 12 years old. He essentially sews women's styles and has been in this business for over 30 years. He chose this business for the love of it and especially per his parents' recommendation. He demonstrates great pleasure in work well-done and in making new things. 

Mr. Yath has already repaid two previous loans and is now requesting a loan of 500,000 francs for renovating his tailoring shop. His wish is to make his business more profitable, to grow his revenues, and to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to renovate his tailor shop

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
Hilda es una mujer sencilla de 47 años; está casada con Moisés. Ambos tienen 5 hijos a los que quiere con mucho amor y cariño. Pero solo vive con 2 de ellos: Shirley y Mayra en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de San Pedro de Cajas. Desde muy joven se dedica al tejido; pues es un legado de la zona. Sus principales prendas son gorras de todo diseño, tamaño y color. Ella misma comercializa en la ciudad de Lima, donde tiene gran demanda, además de llevar queso y menudencia para venderlo a los mismos comerciantes. Según cuenta hace poco cerró su tienda de comestible; pues le fue muy mal en ello; razón por la que comenzó a incursionar en la crianza de cuyes al por mayor y menor. Aunque el comienzo le resulte algo difícil; no la desanima, pues sabe que con esfuerzo y voluntad todo resulta. Ahora comenzó a mejorar su grana con cuyes de raza para poder vender a un mayor precio. Pero como dice ella “sin dejar de tejer”, ya que es una actividad que le brinda diversión y ganancias extras. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Telarmachay” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes para continuar con su objetivo. Además promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas.
Hilda de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de cuyes, para continuar con la crianza intensiva de estos animalitos.
texts.en:
Hilda is an ordinary woman, 47 years old, and married to Moisés.  They have 5 children, for whom she has a lot of love and affection.  But she lives with only 2 of them (Shirley and Mayra) in her own house, located in San Pedro de Cajas.  From the time she was young, she has engaged in knitting, which is typical in that area.  Most of her items are caps of varying designs, sizes, and colors.  She markets them in Lima, where demand is high, and also takes cheese and other snacks to sell to others who are marketing their wares.  She states that a short time ago, she closed her food stall, for things weren’t going well, for which reason she started to move into raising guinea pigs (wholesale and retail).  Although the startup has presented some difficulties, she is not discouraged, because she knows that with hard work and willingness, everything works out.  She has now started to improve her strain with purebred guinea pigs, so as to sell them at a higher price.  But, as she says, “without foregoing knitting,” since this is an activity that offers enjoyment and extra income.  She belongs to the Telarmachay communal bank, and this is her ninth loan with MFP, where she is hoping for the support of all of you in order to pursue her objective.  She also promises to be punctual in paying the installments.
If she has your support, Hilda will use the money requested to purchase guinea pigs, to continue with the careful raising of these little animals.

loans.use: buy guinea pigs.

loans.name: Enrique Gregorio

texts.es:
Enrique es un hombre de 52 años, padre de tres hijos vive con su familia en  la parroquia de "Río Verde" del cantón "Santo Domingo". Santo Domingo es cantón y ciudad de la nueva Provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, que era parroquia rural de Quito,  Santo Domingo está entre la costa y la sierra del Ecuador, punto de enlace entre Quito, Guayaquil, Portoviejo,  y otras ciudades importantes. Situado en los flancos externos de la cordillera occidental, así como en la planicie costeña inferior a los 1000 msnm, es la zona de mayor pluviosidad del país. Tiene una gran riqueza hidrológica: existen cinco cuencas y micro cuencas importantes. Es una zona climática lluviosa subtropical, posee una temperatura promedio de 22 °C.

Trabaja vendiendo refrescos en la ciudad, pero además vive en una pequeña finca que produce frutas. Sus dos trabajos le han servido para poder mantener a su familia. Su esposa le ayuda con sus actividades y se han planteado la meta de comprar un auto, con esto podrán sacar más fácilmente sus productos y poder tener ingresos más rápido. Con esto ellos podrán tener una mejor calidad de vida. Solicitaron un crédito a Fundación Alternativa para invertir en productos para venderlos. De esta manera ellos tendrán un ingreso que les permita alcanzar su meta de comprar un vehículo para que les alivie su duro trabajo.
texts.en:
Enrique is a 52-year-old man.  He has three children and lives with his family in Río Verde parish, in Santo Domingo canton.  Santo Domingo is a canton and city in the new province of Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas.  This was previously a rural parish of Quito.  Santo Domingo is located between Ecuador's coast and mountains.  It is a hub between Quito, Guayaquil, Portoviejo and other important cities.  Located on the flanks of the western mountain range, on the lower coastal plain, 1000 meters above sea level, it is the rainiest area of the country.  The area has great hydrological richness: there are five basins and important micro basins.  The area has a subtropical, humid climate.  The average temperature is 22 °C.

Enrique works selling soft drinks in the city.  However, he also lives on a small farm that produces fruit.  His two jobs have enabled him to support his family.  His wife helps him with his business activities and they are planning to buy a car which will enable them to transport their products more easily and make income more quickly.  This would enable them to enjoy a better quality of life.  Enrique requested a loan from Fundación Alternativa to invest in buying products to sell.  This will make him an income which will enable him to reach his goal of buying a vehicle to make his work easier.

loans.use: to invest in products to sell

loans.name: Domitila

texts.es: Domitila es socia del Banco Comunal Solución, tiene 36 años y 3 hijos, es socia de FINCA Peru desde hace 2 años. Domitila, se dedica a la compra y venta de tara y ladrillos en Pacaycasa, recuerda que su negocio empezó cuando su esposo todavía estaba vivo, y con él iniciaron su negocio ella agradece mucho a Finca por todo el apoyo que le brindaron con las capacitaciones y como hacer negocio, ahora este préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de ladrillos para vender por menor, y su meta es poder hacer su casa y ahí mismo tener una bodega.
texts.en:
Domitila is a member of the “Solucion” (Solution) Communal Bank. She is 36 years old, has 3 children, and has been a member of FINCA Peru since 2 years ago.

Domitila buys and sells tara tree products and bricks in Pacaycasa. She reports that the business was started when her husband was still alive; they began it together. She is grateful to FINCA for all the help it has provided with training on how to build a business.

Now, with this loan, she will buy bricks to sell at retail. Her goal is to be able to build her own house where she can have a store.

loans.use: to buy bricks to sell.

loans.name: Edguin Adan

texts.es:
Edguin Adan tiene 40 años de edad es soltero tiene dos hijos, vive con los hijos de dieciocho, doce años de edad en el Cantón Chillanes Provincia de Bolívar.

La VRC Unión y Progreso la Colombia baja, está conformada por quince integrantes y está ubicada a 90 minutos de la cooperativa esta ventanilla se dedica a Actividades Agrícolas, siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz, Soya plátano, naranja, etc.

Edguin se dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de cacao arroz, maíz, soya, naranja, las compras y las ventas lo realiza en San José del Tambo cada fin de semana.

 Solicita el crédito para poder comprar semillas, abonos e insumos para los cultivos y también invertir en la compra de plantas de cacao.

Con la ayuda del préstamo le ayudará a suplir necesidades económicas, Enfrenta desafíos que son muy frecuentes como la competencia y las plagas. 

El sueño es poderse comprar una casa para poder vivir con los hijos.

En los tiempos libres le gusta salir a pasear con los hijos.
texts.en:
Edguin Adán, 40, is single and has two children.  He lives with his children who are 18 and 12 years old in Chillanes Canton, Bolívar Province.

The “Unión y Progreso la Colombia Baja” communal bank has 15 members and is located 90 minutes from the Cooperative.  This communal bank is involved in farming activities: cocoa bean, rice, corn, soya, banana, orange, etc.

Edguin is a cocoa bean, rice, corn, soya and orange farmer.  He makes his purchases and his sales every weekend in San José del Tambo.

He is requesting the loan to be able to buy seeds, manure and farming supplies and also to buy cocoa bean plants.

Support from the loan will help him meet his economic needs.  He faces frequent challenges like competition and crop infestations.  

His dream is to be able to buy himself a house to live in with his children.  In his spare time he likes to go out on outings with his children.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure and farming supplies as well as to buy cocoa bean plants.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy rice, noodles, chicken and milk.

loans.name: Alia Saturnina

texts.es: Alias Saturnina tiene 45 años, su actividad es la venta de tortillas. Hace más de 7 años que se dedica a este negocio, a pesar de las dificultades que atraviesa como es la falta de dinero suficiente para invertir en su negocio. El negocio lo tiene ubicado en su vivienda en donde la mayoría de sus clientes saben la buena calidad de productos que ofrece. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de cal, maíz, leña, comal. Ella tiene 3 hijos menores de edad por los que tiene que velar cada día.
texts.en: Alia Saturnina, 45, sells tortillas.  She’s been in this business for over 7 years despite the difficulties she faces like lack of sufficient money to invest in her business.  Her business is located in her home where most of her customers are aware of the good quality of the products she offers.  The reason for the loan is to buy lime powder, corn, firewood and a griddle.  She has three minor children that she must watch over every day.

loans.use: to buy lime powder, corn, firewood and a griddle.

loans.name: Libasse

texts.fr: Monsieur Libasse est âgé de 33 ans. Il vit au Sénégal, il est marié et père de 2 enfants dont l’âge  varie  entre 2 et 4 ans. Il est enseignant depuis 2006 dans une école privée du quartier ou il habite. Parallèlement  il fait des prestations de service depuis 2008 accès  sur l’organisation de cérémonies comme mariage, baptême, conférence, etc.  Il a choisi ses activités par passion, mais aussi pour subvenir à ses besoins quotidiens. Ce qui lui procure beaucoup de plaisir c’est le savoir qu’il inculque aux enfants. Il est sociétaire d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC depuis février 2008. Il a déjà remboursé un crédit antérieur. Il sollicite un prêt  de 400 000 frs. Il sollicite un crédit de 400 000 frs prévu pour l’achat de  certains matériels utilisés pour l’organisation d’événements tels que bâches, tissus de décoration, tapis rouge ce qui lui permettra d’être  bien équipé pour offrir des services de qualité a sa clientèle. Son but est d’accroitre ses revenus et améliorer le bien être  de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mr. Libasse is 33 years old and lives in Senegal. He is married and the father of two children, who are 2 and 4 years old. He has been a teacher since 2006 in a private school in the district where he lives. Concurrently, he has worked in the service sector since 2008 organizing events, such as marriages, baptisms, conferences, etc. He chose these kinds of work for the love of them but also for supporting himself from day to day. What makes him very happy is the knowledge he instills in children. 

Mr. Libasse has been an associate of a U-IMCEC branch since February 2008. He has already repaid a previous loan. He is requesting a loan of 400,000 francs to buy certain supplies used for organizing events such as tarps, decorative fabrics, and red carpets that will enable him to equip himself well, so as to offer quality service to his customers. His goal is to grow his revenues and to improve his family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy tarps, decorative fabrics, red carpets, etc. for his business

loans.name: Alexis Jose

texts.es: Alexis José tiene 37 años, su actividad es la venta de ropa y cosméticos. Hace más de 3 años que tiene este medio de vida. Él es una persona responsable por lo que disfruta de realiza esta actividad todos los días. Esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos por lo que siente muy satisfecho con esta experiencia. Él solicita este crédito para la compra de bolsos, tratamientos, lápiz labial, polvos, cremas, shampoo entre otros productos.
texts.en: Alexis José is 37 years old.  His business is selling clothes and cosmetics.  He has been in this line of work for more than three years.  Alexis is a responsible person and he enjoys carrying out this business every day.  This is not the first time that he has taken out a loan and he feels very satisfied with this experience.  He is requesting this loan to buy bags, treatments, lipsticks, powders, creams, shampoo and other products.

loans.use: to buy bags, treatments, lipsticks, powders, creams, shampoo and other products

loans.name: Gregoria Ysabel

texts.es: Gregoria tiene 42 años de edad y su familia está conformada por ella su esposo y 6 hijos, actualmente sigue apoyando a 04 de ellos. A raíz de que los ingresos del esposo como guardián no alcanzaban para cubrir algunos gastos del hogar Gregoria toma la decisión de querer aportar de esta manera decide iniciar su propio negocio, donde en la actualidad se dedica a la venta de verduras y especierías (condimentos) la cual alquila un puesto en un mercadito de su comunidad. Gregoria es una madre emprendedora que  tiene muchas ganas de seguir trabajando, es por ello que con el fin de aumentar su capital solicito el crédito para comprar verduras y condimentos. A futuro a Gregoria le gustaría instalar una panadería en su domicilio ya que nos manifiesta que una de sus hijas estudia repostería. Gregoria agradece a los prestamistas KIVA.
texts.en:
Gregoria is 42 years old.  Her family consists of her husband and six children four of whom are still dependent on her.  Because her husband’s salary as a security guard was insufficient to cover household expenses, Gregoria decided that she wanted to contribute so decided to start her own business selling vegetables and spices (condiments); she rents a stand in a little market in her community.

Gregoria is an enterprising mother who very much wants to continue to work.  Because of this, in order to increase her working capital, she asked for a loan to buy vegetables and condiments.  In the future, Gregoria would like to open a bakery at her house because she tells us that one of her daughters is studying pastry making.  Gregoria thanks Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and condiments.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy mobile phones to resell

loans.name: Maria Bellaluz

texts.es:
La señora Maria Bellaluz ha tenido ya un crédito con KIVA el cual fue para la construcción de unos cuartos en la planta alta de su vivienda. 
       Solicita un préstamo para invertir en su negocio de venta de perfumes, ya que le están pidiendo mas variedad de perfumes para dama y caballero y cosméticos de belleza, por el momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para realizar la inversión. 
       Daña Maria Bellaluz planea pagar el crédito con las ganancias que obtiene de sus venta, ya que su esposo el señor Fernando se encargara de los gastos familiares y escolares de sus hijos con el sueldo que recibe como oficial escolar de la ciudad. 
Espera contar con su cooperación en este préstamo, ya que desea mejorar sus ventas para poder ayudar a su esposo y darles a sus hijos una mejor vida y educación.
texts.en:
Maria Bellaluz has already received a loan from KIVA which she used to build some rooms on the upper floor of her home.  She is requesting this loan to invest in her business selling perfumes as her customers are requesting a greater range of men's and women's perfumes and beauty products.  Right now, she doesn't have the money she needs to make this investment.

Maria Bellaluz plans to repay her loan with the profits that she makes from her sales as her husband, Fernando, will take care of their family expenses and the education expenses of their children with the salary that he earns working as a school official in the city.

Maria Bellaluz hopes that she can count on your cooperation in this loan as she would like to improve her sales so that she can help her husband and provide her children with a better life and education.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy shoes and various items to re-sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fish for resale.

loans.name: Jose Daniel

texts.es: José Daniel tiene 24 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 3 años que tiene este negocio, que surgió con capital propio y con el paso del tiempo ha logrado incrementar su inventario por lo que se siente muy agradecido al saber administrar su negocio y brindarles a sus clientes lo que necesiten. El es un hombre muy responsable y disfruta de su actividad y al mismo tiempo de conversar con sus clientes. el financiamiento es para la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas, trajes, tratamientos, calzado y bolsos.
texts.en: José Daniel, 24, sells general merchandise.  He’s had this business for more than 3 years.  He started it with his own capital and in time has managed to increase his inventory.  He feels grateful for this because he’s known how to properly manage his business and provide his customers with what they need.  He is a very responsible man and he enjoys his work as well as chatting with his customers.  The loan is to buy pants, shirts, skirts, suits, treatments, footwear and purses.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts, suits, treatments, footwear and purses.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana, de 59 años, es una mujer trabajadora y valiente, es madre soltera de siete hijos, quienes son mayores y gracias a su entrega pudo darles una buena educación. Ella vive en su casa propia en compañía de su hija que es madre soltera y tiene un hijo de siete meses. Juntas trabajan para salir adelante y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su nieto. Su trabajo consiste en la venta abarrotes, para lo cual posee un tienda y por lo que siempre esta abastecida de variados productos, siendo obtenidos al por mayor y a menor precio. Dicho negocio esta instalado en el interior de su casa, y cuya calle es muy transita, por ello la afluencia de gente que eso le ha generado mucha ventaja para su negocio. Para Ana, la venta de bedidas heladas es lo que más solicta, pues se encuentra en una época del año donde hay mucha calor. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que dispone de su tiempo para poder realizar las labores de su hogar y poder cuidar a su nieta. Este será el cuarto crédito con MFP, por lo qur espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para continuar con su trabajo. Con el monto solicitado, comprará mercadería para su bodega, además de provisionarse de bebidas.
texts.en:
59-year-old Ana is a hard-working and brave woman.  She is a single mother and has seven grown-up children.  Thanks to her devotion, she was able to provide her children with a good education.  Ana lives in her own home together with her daughter who is a single mother and has a seven-month-old son.  They both work to get ahead and provide Ana's grandson with a better quality of life.

Ana's business is selling groceries.  She owns a store which is always stocked with a wide variety of products.  She obtains her products wholesale, for a lower price.  This business is located inside Ana's home.  She lives on a very busy street and there are a lot of people.  This has given her a great advantage in her business.  What Ana's customers are most requesting is for her to sell iced drinks as it is very hot during this time of year.
