What Ana likes about her work is that she can make time to carry out her housework and care for her grandson.

This will be Ana's fourth loan from MFP and she hopes to receive your support so that she can continue in her work.  She will use the sum she has requested to buy merchandise for her store.  She will also stock up with drinks.

loans.use: to buy more products including drinks

loans.name: Sami

texts.en: Sami is a 26-year-old single man from Gaza. He would like to have a farm to raise chickens. Sami hopes that throughout the duration of this loan he will be able to buy food for the animals and refrigerators. He hopes that this will increase his income and he will be able to support himself and his family.

loans.use: buy food for the animals and refrigerators

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es:
Luis Enrique tiene 41 años de edad es  soltero no tiene hijos, vive solo en el Canton Chillanes provincia Bolívar.

La VRC Unión y Progreso la Colombia baja, está conformada por quince integrantes y está ubicada a 90 minutos de la cooperativa esta ventanilla se dedica a Actividades Agrícolas, siembra de cacao, arroz, maíz, Soya plátano, naranja, etc.

Luis  se dedica a la agricultura, a la siembra de cacao arroz, maíz, soya, naranja, las compras y las ventas lo realiza en San José del Tambo cada fin de semana.

 Solicita el crédito para poder comprar semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, ures e insumos para los cultivos y también invertir en la compra de plantas de cacao.

Con la ayuda del préstamo le ayudará a suplir necesidades económicas y a tener una buena cosecha.  Enfrenta desafíos que son muy frecuentes como la competencia y las plagas. 

El sueño es poderse comprar una casa. En los tiempos libres le gusta salir a pasear por el campo  y visitar a los padres.
texts.en:
Luis Enrique, 41, is single and has no children.  He lives alone in Chillanes Canton, Bolívar Province.

The “Unión y Progreso la Colombia Baja” communal bank has 15 members and is located 90 minutes from the Cooperativa.  This communal bank is dedicated to farming activities: cocoa bean, rice, corn, soy, banana, oranges, etc.

Luis is a cocoa bean, corn, soy and orange farmer.  His purchases and his sales take place in San José del Tambo every weekend.

He is asking for the loan to be able to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, urea and supplies for his crops and also to buy cocoa bean plants.

Support from the loan will help him meet his economic needs and to have a good harvest.  He faces frequent challenges like competition and crop infestations.

His dream is to be able to buy himself a house.  In his spare time he likes to go on outings in the countryside and to visit his parents.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, urea and farming supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen tiene 54 años, es una mujer encantadora, muy alegre y dinámica. Convive con su pareja y es madre de dos hijos, quienes ya son mayores e independientes. Juntos habitan en su casa propia. Su trabajo consiste en la venta de ropa y artículos para el hogar, siendo estos ofrecidos por medio de catálogos. Sus sistema de venta, es dejar a crédito los productos, y al cabo de un tiempo realiza la cobranzas, por otro lado, hay ocasiones que sale ella misma a ofrecer su mercadería de manera ambulante, ya sea amigos, familiares o compañeros de trabajo, que es en una institución para el estado. Tiene 10 años ejerciendo esta actividad, además que le gusta estar en contacto con la gente. Para el futuro quisiera montar una bodega en su casa y con ello tener un ingreso adicional, ya que tiene en mente su trabajo para dedicarse al comercio, que es la venta de ropa y artículos para el hogar. Este es el octavo crédito con MFP, por lo que espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para continuar con su trabajo. Con el monto solicitado, comprará artículos para el hogar y ropa,
texts.en:
Carmen, 54, is a charming woman; she’s very cheerful and dynamic.  She lives with her spouse and is the mother of two children who are already independent adults.  They live together in their own home.  Her work consists in sale of clothes and articles for the home that are sold via catalogue.  Her method of operating is selling on credit and then collecting payment after a certain time.  On the other hand, she sometimes goes out herself to sell her wares among her friends, family members or coworkers in a state institution.

She’s been in this line of work for 10 years and she enjoys being in contact with the people.  In the future, she’d like to set up a store at her house to have an additional source of income because she has in mind to go into commerce, that is, the sale of clothes and items for the home.


This is the 8th MFP loan so she hopes for support from each of you to stay in business.  She will use the requested amount to buy items for the home and clothes.

loans.use: to buy clothes and items for the home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pigs and feed.

loans.name: Mustafa

texts.en: Mustafa is a 21-year-old single man from Gaza. He would like to have a farm to raise animals. Mustafa hopes that throughout this loan he will be able to buy food for the animals and buy chicks as well. He hopes that this will increase his income and he will be able to support himself and his family.

loans.use: buy food for the animals and buy chicks as well

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies to install a ceiling in her house.

loans.name: Donitilda

texts.es: Donitilda tiene 43 años, es una mujer amable y emprendedora, convive con su pareja y es madre de cinco hijos de 27, 25, 20, 14 y 5 años, quienes viven con ella en su casa propia. Ella y su esposo trabajan duro para brindarles educación y alimentación a sus hijos. Su trabajo consiste en brindar servicio mecánico, pues posee un taller que montó junto a uno de sus hijos,  quien estudio mecánica de motores durante dos años. Desde entonces se han hecho socios de éste taller, siendo Donitilda la encargada de proveer los materiales, mientras que su hijo se encarga de reparar. Le esta yendo bien, pues tienen muchos clientes, y esto debido a los conocimientos que tiene su hijo. Su taller, es un espacio alquilado en una zona llamada Pucallpillo, un barrio dentro de la ciudad. Segun manifiesta le gusta lo que hace, además de que está a lado de su hijo, puede generar ingresosos para su familia. Mas adelante desearía vender combustibles y aceites paravehículos. Este será el cuarto crédito con MFP, y espera el apoyo de ustedes para consolidar su negocio. Con el monto solicitado, comprará lubricantes y repuestos para implementar su taller, asimismmo comprará herramientas.
texts.en:
Donitilda is 43 years old.  She is a kind and entrepreneurial woman who lives with her partner.  She has five children, aged 27, 25, 20, 14 and 5,  who live with her in her own home.  She and her husband work hard in order to educate and feed their children.

Donitilda's business is providing an auto repair service.  She owns an auto repair shop which she set up with one of her children who studied motor  mechanics for two years.  Since then, they have worked as partners in the repair shop.  Donitilda is in charge of providing the materials while her son is in charge of repairing the vehicles.  It is going well and they have many customers as a result of her son's knowledge.  The shop is located in rented premises in an area called Pucallpillo, a neighborhood within the city.  Donitilda tells us that she enjoys what she does, enjoys being alongside her son and is able to make income for her family.  In the future, she would like to sell vehicle fuel and oils.

This will be Donitilda's fourth loan from MFP and she hopes to receive your support so that she can consolidate her business.  She will use the sum she has requested to buy lubricants and spare parts to equip her workshop.  She will also buy tools.

loans.use: to buy lubricants, spare parts and tools

loans.name: Luis Roberto

texts.es:
Luis Roberto es un luchador que desde hace 20 años tiene su propio negocio de construcción donde genera 4 empleos directos. Es padre de 2 hijas y su mayor sueño es que a futuro ambas sean profesionales, para ello trabaja día a día con la ilusión de progresar y mejorar su calidad de vida.

Actualmente Luis Roberto necesita comprar una máquina para mezclar,  herramienta de trabajo básica para agilizar sus procesos de construcción, y mejorar la calidad de los proyectos terminados, pero no cuenta con el capital suficiente para esta inversión por lo que solicita un crédito con el cual dar un paso más hacia el progreso.
texts.en:
Luis Roberto is a tenacious man who has had his own construction firm for the last 20 years that generates four actual employment opportunities.  He’s the father of two daughters and his greatest dream is that in future both of them will be professionals.  He works daily with the dream of making progress and improving his quality of life.

At present, Luis Roberto needs to buy a cement mixer, a basic work tool that makes the construction process easier and improves the quality of his completed jobs.  But he lacks sufficient capital to make this investment and this is why he’s asking for a loan to take another step toward progress.

loans.use: to buy a small cement mixer.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.es: Edwin, de 52 años, es un hombre bueno y trabajador, convive con su pareja y es padre de dos hijos de 10 y 4 años, quienes dependen de él para su educación. Juntos habitan en su casa propia, en donde comparte junto a su pareja la alegría de criar a sus hijos, quienes son el motivo para salir adelante. Su trabajo consiste en el transporte de pasajeros, por el cual posee un mototaxi que desde muy trempano monta en busca de pasajeros. Es así que recorre las diversas calles de su ciudad, actividad que ha ejecutado durante 10 años y gracias a ello ha logrado darles comodidad a su familia. Manifiesta además que en este trabajo puede disponer de su tiempo para saber que lugar prioriza más movilidad, por ejemplo a la 1pm de la tarde se dirige a los colegios, pues es el tiempo en que sale el alumnado, y durante las 6 pm en los centros laborales o municipios. Con éste trabajo le esta yendo bien, ya que como su mototaxi es propia no tiene que pagar a alguien por el alquiler de una, y eso le genera mas ganancias. Su plan a futuro es comprar dos unidades más, para así ampliar su flota y poder alquilarlas. Este será el crédito número doce con MFP, y está contento con el grupo al que pertenece ya que son muy responsables y siempre cumplen a tiempo. Con el monto solicitado, comprará algunas piezas y enviará su mototaxi al taller mecánico para que le hagan algunas reparaciones, además invertirá para una pequeña tienda que desea instalar en su casa.
texts.en:
Edwin is 52 years old and he is a good and hardworking man. He lives with his partner and he has two children aged 10 and 4 who depend on him for their education. They live together in their own house where he and his partner share the joy of raising their children, who are his motivation for getting ahead. 

His job consists of providing transport and he owns the mototaxi which he sets out on very early in the morning, in search of passengers. He subsequently travels around the different streets of his city, something which he has done for 10 years and thanks to this, he has managed to provide comfort for his family. He also states that in this type of work he can decide what areas to prioritize, for example at 1pm he goes to the schools since the students get out at this time and at 6pm he goes to workplaces or town centers. This job is going well for him as due to the fact that his mototaxi is his own, he doesn't have to pay anyone for rental and this generates more profits. 

His plan for the future is to buy two more vehicles in order to expand and rent them out. This will be the twelfth loan with MFP and he is happy with the group to which he belongs as they are always on time and very responsible. With the requested sum, he will buy some parts and send his mototaxi to the garage for some repair work. He will also invest in a small shop that he would like to open in his house.

loans.use: to buy parts for his mototaxi and take it to the repair shop as well as buying goods for his shop.

loans.name: Maria Wilma

texts.es: La señora Wilma y su familia viven en la zona villa armonía ubicada a veinte minutos del centro de la ciudad. Ella trabaja vendiendo diferentes tipos de cosas a crédito como ser frazadas, camas, ollas, juegos de vajillas y regalos. Tienen un promedio de 50 a 70 clientes en diferentes zonas e inclusive en oficinas públicas. Ella habla con sus futuros clientes y ellos hacen diferentes pedidos que ella paga y luego va cobrando de manera semanal o mensual con un incremento por el tiempo que tarden en pagar. Lo mas resaltante de esta actividad es que ella hace que sus clientes elijan los productos que desean y no así como hacen otras personas que primero compran los productos antes de ofrecerlos. Además esto asegura que sus clientes estén satisfechos ya que son ellos los que elijen de manera directa lo que van a adquirir. La Sra. Wilma trabaja con emprender desde hace tres años y en este tiempo demostró ser una cliente puntual y responsable. En esta oportunidad solicita el préstamo de dinero para la compra de ollas a presión para pedidos de sus clientes.
texts.en: Wilma and her family live in the Villa Armonia zone, located some 20 minutes from the city center. She works selling different types of things on credit, including blankets, beds, pots, sets of glassware, and gifts. Wilma has on average 50 to 70 customers in different zones, including in public offices. She speaks with her future customers and they make different requests which she purchases and then later she collects payments weekly or monthly, with an increase for time payment. The advantage of this activity is that Wilma has her customers select the products they want rather than as with other persons, first buying the products before offering them for sale. In addition, this assures that customers are satisfied, since they selected directly what they are acquiring. Wilma has worked with Emprender for some 3 years and during this time she has proven to be a punctual and responsible client. On this occasion, she is requesting a cash loan to buy pressure cookers ordered by customers.

loans.use: buy pressure cookers ordered by her customers.

loans.name: Janina

texts.es: Janina, de 26 años, es una mujer alegre y muy responsable, conviviente y madre de dos hijos de 5 y 1 años. Juntos habitan en su casa propia a lado de su pareja y sus dos hijos por quienes todos los días se esfuerzan al máximo para poder brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Su trabajo consiste en el corte y confección de prendas de vestir, así como el remendado de prendas. Es así que amigos, vecinos y familiares, solicitan de su servicio, pues es muy buena haciendo su trabajo, aunque lleva seis meses en este negocio, pero el gusto por hacer bien su trabajo ha logrado ganarse clientes. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que puede disponer de su tiempo cuando ella desea, ya que es independiente, así puede estar a lado de sus hijos quienes como aún son muy chicos y necesitan de sus cuidados. Este será el préstamo número 12 con MFP, le esta yendo bien con su grupo ya que todos son muy responsables y siempre cumplen a tiempo con las cuotas establecidad. Con el monto solicitado, comprará materiales  de costura, entre ellas; telas de algodón e hilos diversos colores.
texts.en: Janina, 26 years old, is a happy and very responsible woman. She lives with her partner and is the mother of two children, who are 1 and 5 years old.  Together, she, her partner, and their two children live in their own house. Every day, she and her partner work as hard as they can to bring their children a better quality of life. Her work consists of making and mending clothing. Friends, neighbors, and family members use her services, and her work is going very well, even though she has been doing it for six months. She does a good job, and this has succeeded in winning her customers. What she likes about her work is that she can spend her time as she wants, since she is independent.  This way, she can be with her children, who are still very small and need her care. This will be her 12th loan with MFP. Things are going well with her group, since everyone is very responsible and always makes payments on time. With the amount requested, she will purchase sewing materials, among them cotton fabric and thread of various colors.

loans.use: to purchase fabric and thread of various colors.

loans.name: Ximena Paola

texts.es: La señora  Ximena  tiene la actividad de venta de ropa ella es ambulante generalmente sus ventas se concentran en distintas oficinas de la zona central, ella  también recibe la ayuda de la hermana que trabaja como asalariada con el cargo en una oficina del centro, y es ahí donde ofrece sus productos, tiene ya mucha clientela, la cliente vive con su hermana en la casa  de sus padres y de esta manera cuida la casa, ya que sus  padres se encuentran viviendo en Cochabamba por motivos de salud,  con el dinero del  crédito comprara mercadería por mayor ropa ya que tienen muchos pedidos,  Lo mas resaltante de esta actividad es que ella hace que sus clientes elijan los productos que desean y no así como hacen otras personas que primero compran los productos antes de ofrecerlos, haciendo que el  cliente se encuentre satisfecho por la compra.
texts.en:
Ximena has an door-to-door clothing sales business. Her sales are generally concentrated in various offices around the downtown area. She gets help from her sister who is a salaried employee at an office in the city center. That is where she offers her products. She has a large clientele.

She lives with her sister in her parent's house and in this way takes care of the home, since her parents live in Cochabamba for health reasons. With the money from this loan she will buy wholesale merchandise as she has many orders. The most outstanding aspect of this business is that she allows her customers to choose the products they want unlike others who purchase the products ahead of time. This makes her customers very satisfied with their purchases.

loans.use: to purchase pre-ordered clothing.

loans.name: Ladith

texts.es:
Ladith, de 29 años, es una mujer dinámica, alegre y emprendedora, es conviviente y madre de dos hijos de 9 y 2 años. Juntos habitan en casa de su suegra. Su trabajo consiste en la venta de comida en su restaurante que esta en un local acondicionado y montó en la casa de su suegra. Es así que desde muy temprano se lenvanta para ir al mercado en busca de las verduras y carnes más frescas, y del que luego se dedica a preparalos. A partir del medio día ya están listos para la llegada de sus asiduos comensales. Tiene muchos clientes pues gracias a su rica sazón ha logrado ganarse muchos consumidores. En éste trabajo lo hace sola y espera consolidarlo, ya que más adelante tiene en mente ampliarlo.
Para ella la cocina es su pasión, es por eso que le encanta su trabajo, desde muy niña le enseñaron este oficio y con el tiempo aprendió los secretos para tener una buena sazón. Este será el segundo crédito con MFP, le agrada mucho el grupo que conforma, pues su grupo es muy responsable y cumplidos, espera poder seguir siendo la clienta puntual como se mostró en su primer ciclo y no fallar al grupo, además manifiesta estar muy agradecida por los prestamos otorgados ya que le son de mucha ayuda para poder crecer junto a su negocio. Con el monto solicitado, comprará bebidas gasificadas para su venta y acompañar los alimentos que expende, además ingredientes e insumos para la preparación de sus platillos.
texts.en:
Ladith, 29, is dynamic, cheerful and enterprising.  She lives with the father of her two children, aged 2 and 9.  Together they live in the home of her mother-in-law.  She sells meals in her restaurant, which is air-conditioned and located in her mother-in-law's house.  She rises very early to go to the market to search for the freshest vegetables and meats, which she prepares afterward.  By midday, the food is ready for the arrival of her regular customers.  She has many clients thanks to her savory cooking.  She works alone and hopes to fortify her business as she hopes to later expand.

Cooking is a passion for Ladith, and for this reason she loves her job.  As a child she was taught the trade and with time learned the secrets of flavorful cooking.  This will be her second loan with Kiva partner MFP.  She is grateful to the group, which is responsible and accomplished.  She hopes to continue being a reliable client as demonstrated in her first loan cycle and not let her group down.  She is very grateful to receive loans, which allow her to grow her business.  With the amount requested, she will buy carbonated beverages to accompany the meals she sells.  Also, she will purchase ingredients and supplies for the preparation of her dishes.

loans.use: To purchase carbonated beverages and ingredients for the preparation of meals.

loans.name: Nancy Zenobia

texts.es: la Señora Nancy  tiene la actividad de contratista de trabajos en piso como ser cepillado, plastificado y puesta de parquet, también tiene la actividad de venta de maderas como ser sócalos jansa y tablones, el negocio prácticamente se encuentra en el mismo domicilio que queda ubicado en la zona de Pampahasi, la señora es viuda cuenta con domicilio propio tiene un hijo de 15 años de edad, la señora actualmente percibe también  ingresos de anticréticos del domicilio, ella sola mantiene su hogar y la educación de su hijo, con el dinero del  crédito comprara bitrotan para el cepillado de pisos, es una persona joven y muy trabajadora el deseo de la Sra. es el de un día ver a su hijo profesional.
texts.en: Nancy is a contractor and offers services such as planing and laminating wood floors and laying parquet tiles.  She also sells wood molding, planks, and Jansa cleaning supplies.  The business is located in her home, in the Pampahasi area.  She is a widow with a 15 year old son, and owns her own home.  She also currently receives income from an “anticrético” home rental agreement.  (See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anticr%C3%A9tico).  She alone takes care of her home and her son’s education.  With the money from the loan, she will buy Vitroceram laminate floor tiles. She is a young and hard-working.   She wishes to see her son in a professional job one day.

loans.use: to buy Vitroceram laminate floor tiles.

loans.name: Avigail Judith

texts.es:
Avigail de 64 años es una mujer trabajadora que hace 11 años empezo vendiendo helados, Jugos y continuo con snacks ahora vende peluches. En la actualidad su trabajo lo hace sola de 8:00am hasta las 21:00pm de lunes a domingos. Unas de sus dificultades es cuando llega a enfermarse ya que no puede vender. Con el prestamp quiere comprar bebeidas y helados para mejorar sus ingresos. 

Unas de sus metas es poder tener un local mas grande para poder vender sus helados y peluches.
texts.en:
Avigail, age 64, is a hard-working woman.  Eleven years ago she started selling ice cream, juice, and continued with snacks.  She now sells stuffed animals.  She currently works alone from 8:00 a.m. until 9:00 p.m. on Mondays through Sundays.  One of her difficulties is that when she gets sick, she is not able to sell.

She wants to use the loan to buy drinks and ice cream in order to improve her income.  One of her goals is to be able to have a larger place to sell her ice cream and stuffed animals.

loans.use: to buy drinks and ice cream.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: La señora Ana es nacida en la ciudad de Santa Cruz de la Sierra,  vive actualmente en la zona Los Jazmines,  Su negocio es en el mismo domicilio,  Ella se dedica al alquiler de trajes de todo tipo y diseños de trajes típicos hace más de 2 años que se dedica a esta actividad. La señora demostró ser responsable en su crédito anterior. Ahora el crédito otorgado a la señora es para la compra de tela para así confeccionar más trajes y poder tener más variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes, generalmente para las distintas fiestas y horas cívicas en los colegios ella tiene mucha clientela, también realiza trabajo por pedidos de distintas instituciones educativas.
texts.en:
Ana was born in the city of Santa Cruz de le Sierra.  She currently lives in the Los Jazmines area, and her business is in her home.

She rents all types of clothing and typical clothing designs.  She has been doing this business activity for two years.

She has demonstrated herself to be responsible with her previous loan.  Her current loan is to buy fabric to make more clothes and have a greater variety to offer her customers.  She generally has a lot of customers for various holiday festivities as well as school assemblies open to the public.  She also works by order with different educational institutions.

loans.use: to buy fabric.

loans.name: Lorena Maribel

texts.es:
Lorena hace 15 años comenzo vendiendo interiores en la bahia ahora en la actualidad vende pantalone, camisas. Por enfermedad dejo su negocio nuevamente retorno su actividad hace 2 años. Pero para mejorar su situacion economica en la actualidad labora de lunes a domingos de 8:30am 19:00pm. 

Ahora no tiene ninguna dificultad en su trabajo es Madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos en escuela fiscal. Con el prestamo va a comprar Pantalones, Camisetas y interiores. Unas de sus metas es mejorar su capital de trabajo y crecer con su negocio
texts.en:
Lorena began selling undergarments in the Playas (Villamil) bay area fifteen years ago.  Currently she sells pants and shirts.  She left work due to illness but returned two years ago.  To improve her economic situation, she works Monday through Sunday from 8:30 am until 7:00 pm.

She now has no difficulty in performing her work.  She is a single mother and has two children attending public school.  With this loan, she will buy pants, shirts and undergarments.  One of her goals is to improve her working capital and to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy pants and shirts.

loans.name: Lice

texts.es:
Lice, de 46 años, es una mujer emprendedora y muy trabajadora, esta casada y vive en casa propia junto a su esposo y su hija de 21 años quien es estudiante y aún depende de ella, ya que esta en planes de sacar su titulo universitario. Su trabajo consiste en la venta de ropa, mercadería que lo obtiene de la ciudad de Lima y los vende a crédito y al contado, ya sea para amigos y familiares. Muchas veces espera en su casa a que vayan los clientes, pero en otras ocasiones sale a la casa de ellos para colocar sus diversos productos. Tiene cinco años haciendo este trabajo y en ocasiones la ayuda su hija, quien vende dichas prendas a sus compañeras de la universidad. Le gusta su trabajo, pues como dice: "El tiempo es muy importante cuando uno mismo se sabe organizar y disponer" afirma; y como en este trabajo dispone de su tiempo le parece un buen trabajo. Espera poder mantenerse con este ritmo, ya que más adelantes desea diversificar su venta con zapatos y algunos accesorios. Este será el cuarto crédito con MFP, le esta yendo muy bien en su grupo, y espera poder seguir así. Asimismo agradece mucho la oportunidad que le dan de poder invertir y hacer crecer su capital, por lo que espera nuevamente su apoyo. 
Con el monto solicitado comprará mercadería en prendas de vestir y ayudará a su hija para que pueda sacar su titulo, cuya profesión es la de contadora pública.
texts.en:
46-year-old Lice is an entrepreneurial and very hard-working woman.  She is married and lives in her own home together with her husband and her 21-year-old daughter who is a student.  Her daughter is still dependent on her as she is in the process of obtaining her university degree.  

Lice's business is selling clothes.  She obtains her merchandise in the city of Lima and sells it on credit and for cash to friends and family members.  She often waits at home for her customers to come to her but sometimes she goes to their homes in order to show them her products.  Lice has been in this line of work for five years and her daughter sometimes helps her, selling the garments to her university friends.  Lice enjoys her work.  She says: "Time is very important and you must know how to get organized and plan your time well".  In this business, Lice is able to plan her own time and therefore it seems like a good job to her.  She hopes to be able to continue working at this rhythm as, in the future, she would like to diversify her business by starting to sell shoes and some accessories.

This will be Lice's fourth loan from MFP.  She is doing very well in her group and she hopes to keep it up.  She is very grateful for the opportunity that they give her to invest and grow her capital and so she is hoping once again to receive support.  She will use the sum she has requested to buy merchandise (clothes) and to help her daughter so that she can her obtain her degree.  Her daughter has studied to become a certified public accountant.

loans.use: to buy more clothes and pay for her daughter's degree

loans.name: María Monserrate

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal José Cesario Reyes se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

La señora  María es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que les brindan estos créditos para salir adelante. Tiene 39 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos de 19, 16, 13 y 11 años de edad, todos sus hijos aun viven con ella y dos de ellos  estudian en  escuela y colegio. Su esposo es comerciante.

Nuestra amiga realiza el crédito para ayudar a su esposo el mismo que se dedica a la venta de pescado, nos cuenta nuestra amiga que su esposo se desplaza por toda la ciudad vendiendo sus productos en un triciclo de su propiedad, los mismos que en la madrugada compra en la ciudad de Manta a pescadores que llegan hasta las playas de esa ciudad, tiene cerca de 10años dedicado a esta actividad y es como ha podido sacar adelante a su familia.

Este crédito es para comprar pescado para la venta diaria.
 
Sus sueños son comprar un carro para vender sus productos a otras partes más alejadas.
texts.en:
The José Cesario Reyes Communal Bank meets every two weeks in Montecristi Canton, known for its rich precolonial culture and its nationally and internationally renowned handicrafts and its famous straw hats.

María is a founding member of the bank and she likes it because of the help the loans offer for getting ahead.  She is 39 years old and married, and from this relationship she has four children, ages 19, 16, 13, and 11.  All her children still live with her and two of them are studying.  Her husband is a businessman.

María is getting the loan to help her husband who himself sells fish.  She tells us that her husband goes all over the city on his own tricycle selling his products, which he buys in the morning in the city of Manta from fishermen who arrive from the beaches of that city.  He has been doing this work for about ten years, and this is how he has been able to get the family ahead.

This loan is to buy fish for daily sales.

Their dream is to buy a car to sell the fish in more distant areas.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Jonas

texts.es: El sr. Jonás vive en  la zona del plan 3000 en casa familiar el vive al lado de su esposa  y su hijo. El se dedica al transporte publico con su propio vehículo, también tiene una venta de repuestos de automóviles en su casa, el tiene 4 años de experiencia en el transporte publico. El crédito que esta solicitando es para la compra de una compresora de aire ya que también esta abriendo un taller mecánico. El sr. Jonás es un hombre trabajador, que con mucho esfuerzo se compro un vehículo para trabajar de noche y de día atiende su venta de repuestos con el apoyo de su esposa, con el dinero del crédito comprara una compresora de aire, es un apersona muy trabajadora con deseos de seguir adelante para mejorar la calidad de vida de el y de toda su familia.
texts.en:
Señor Jonas lives in the Plan 3000 neighborhood in the family home with his wife and his son. He makes his living in public transportation, using his own vehicle. He also sells spare auto parts in his home. He has 4 years of experience in public transportation.

The loan that he is requesting is for the purchase of an air compressor, as he is also opening a mechanic shop. Señor Jonas is a hardworking man who, through much effort, purchased a car so that he could work at night. During the day, he handles his spare parts sales with the support of his wife. He will purchase an air compressor with the money from the loan. He is a very hardworking person with desires to succeed in order to improve the quality of life for himself and for his whole family.

loans.use: to purchase an air compressor.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 44 años, es una mujer valiente y trabajadora, es conviviente y madre de tres hijos de 23, 22 y 16 años, quienes aún dependen de ella. Ella y su pareja trabajan mucho para poder brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Su trabajo consiste en la venta de bebidas al por mayor, tiene una pequeña distribuidora que se encarga de dejar a consignación sus productos, ya sea para diferentes eventtos sociales. Tiene un pequeño local en su casa donde acondiciono un espacio para atender a sus clientes, asimismo cuenta con la ayuda de sus hijos y su pareja. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que puede trabajar a lado de ellos y puede disponer del tiempo necesario para hacer otras actividades. Este negocio le remunera ganancias y por ello desea mantenerse a ese ritmo, ya que desea ampliar su negocio con más productos que son indispensables por la zona en la que vive. Este será el tercer crédito con MFP, le gusta el grupo al que pertenece ya que son muy responsables y puntuales en sus pagos, espera poder seguir trabajando juntos con ustedes, ya que gracias a ello puede consolidar su trabajo. Con el monto solicitado, comprará más bebidas para tener en stock y así poder cumplir con los pedidos que le solicitan sus clientes.
texts.en:
44-year-old María is a brave and hard-working woman.  She lives with her partner and has three children aged 23, 22 and 16 who are still dependent on her.  She and her partner work hard so that they can provide them with a better quality of life.

María's business is selling drinks wholesale.  She has a small wholesaler's and she provides her products on consignment for different social events.  She has a small space in her home which she fitted out so that she could serve her customers there.  She has the help of her children and her partner.  What María enjoys about her work is that she can work together with her family and can arrange her time so that she is also able to carry out other activities.  This business provides her with profits and, for that reason, she would like to continue working at this rhythm.  She would like to expand her business with more products that are needed in her area.

This will be María's third loan from MFP.  She likes the group to which she belongs as everybody is responsible and punctual in making their loan repayments.  She hopes to be able to continue working with you as it enables her to strengthen her business.  She will use the sum she has requested to buy more drinks to have in stock so that she can fill the orders that her customers place with her.

loans.use: to buy more drinks

loans.name: Elvis Edward

texts.es: El señor Elvis se dedica al transporte de pasajeros en el área urbana de nuestra ciudad trabaja como transportista  en radio taxi,  se dedica a esta actividad hace  6 años,  el señor vive junto a su esposa y su pequeño hijo; su domicilio es familiar ubicado en la zona norte de Cochabamba,  el préstamo que solicita es para realizar mantenimiento y refacción  a  su vehículo el cual es su única fuente de ingresos; el señor indica que el crédito le ayudara de gran manera para continuar con su actividad la cual le ayuda a sustentar a su familia y también brindar un buen servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Elvis provides urban transportation services in our city; he works as a radio dispatched taxi driver.  He’s been in this line of work for the last six years.  He lives with his wife and young son.  His family home is located in the north part of Cochabamba.  

The loan he’s requesting is to service his vehicle which is his only source of income.  He indicates that the loan will be of great help to him to continue in his activity which helps him support his family and also to provide good customer service.

loans.use: to service his vehicle.

loans.name: Neyva Coralit

texts.es: La señora Neyva nacida en la ciudad de Cochabamba,  vive con su esposo el señor Juan con el cual tiene 2 hijos de 3 y 5 años. Ella se dedica a la venta de abarrote, tiene una tienda de barrio en su mismo domicilio hace más de un 1 año, en la zona Nuevo Palmar. El crédito otorgado a la señora es para la compra de un frízer y  mercadería para surtir su negocio. Ella es una persona joven muy trabajadora con ganas de mejorar la calidad de vida de toda su familia,  esta muy agradecida a Emprender por confiar en su persona, ya que es su primer crédito.
texts.en:
Neyva was born in the city of Cochabamba.  She lives with her husband, Juan, and has two children who are 3 and 5 years old.  She sells groceries.  She has had a home-based neighborhood store for the last year in the Nuevo Palmar neighborhood.  

The loan granted her is to buy a freezer and stock merchandise for her store.  She is a young, very hardworking person with a strong desire to improve her entire family’s quality of life.  She is very grateful to Emprender for the trust placed in her since this is her first loan.

loans.use: to buy a freezer.

loans.name: Matilde Flora

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal José Cesario Reyes se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Matilde, tiene 59 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cinco hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun vive con ella. Su esposo trabaja en el Municipio de Montecristi.

Nuestra amiga es un ama de casa que para ayudarse y lograr algo por su cuenta tiene desde hace tres años un local en su casa donde da el servicio de copias y también vende de helados, jugos, gaseosas, golosinas, etc. Trabaja todos los días en su negocio y nos cuenta que son muchas las personas que a diario se dan cita en su local ya sea para sacar copias o para disfrutar de sus deliciosos helados.

Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más papel para copias, gaseosas y helados para surtir su negocio. Está desde el inicio en el Banco Comunal y le gusta por los beneficios que les brinda la institución. 

Sus sueños son seguir adelante en su negocio y en su vida personal.
texts.en:
The José Cesario Reyes communal bank meets every two weeks in Montecristi Canton which is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its crafts that are famous both nationally and internationally; it’s where the famous straw hats come from.

We met Matilde, 59, here.  She’s married and has five children who are all adults now although one still lives with her.  Her husband works for the city of Montecristi.

Our friend is a housewife who, in order to help herself and accomplish something on her own, opened a space in her house three years ago where she provides photocopying services and also sells ice cream, soft-drinks, snacks, etc.  She works every day in her store and she tells us that she has many people come by daily to either make copies or to enjoy her delicious ice cream.

This loan will be used to buy more paper for the copier, soft-drinks and ice cream to stock her business.  She’s been in the communal bank since the beginning and she likes it because of the benefits the institution provides.  Her dream is to continue forward both in her business and in her personal life.

loans.use: to buy copier paper, soft-drinks and ice cream.

loans.name: Melita

texts.es: Melita, de 40 años, es una mujer emprendedora y responsable, es conviviente y madre de seis hijos de 19, 17, 15, 6, 3 años y el último de 8 meses de nacido, ellos aún dependen de ella y de su pareja para su educación y alimentación. Juntos habitan en su casa propia en donde hacen todo lo posible para brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. Su trabajo consiste en la venta de ropa usada, que es vendida en la carretera hasta el kilómetro 86, asimismo dicha mercadería a los pobladores que viven en la rivera, y del que le pagan con algún animal. Tiene  10 años en este trabajo, y manifiesta que le esta yendo bien, sin embargo tiene un recien nacido, no puede estar viajando, así que esta pensando en poner un nuevo negocio que sea en su casa y le permita seguir teniendo ingresos sin tener que tomarse muchos riesgos de estar yendo por lugares alejados. Por ello planea montar una tienda de abarrotes, por lo que espera le vaya bien, ya que todas tus expectativas están puestas en este nuevo negocio que esta queriendo emprender. Este será el crédito número 14 con MFP, es una muy buena socia en su grupo, y siempre se caracterizó por ser puntual y colaboradora con los demás, espera poder seguir trabajando juntos ya que gracias a los préstamos otorgados le han sido de mucha ayuda para su inversión y para aumentar su capital. Con el monto solicitado, comprará mercadería para su bodega, además implementará con algunos andamios y abarrotes para iniciar con su nuevo proyecto.
texts.en:
Melita, 40, is a hardworking and responsible woman.   She is in a common-law marriage and has six children: 19, 17, 15, 6, 3 and the youngest is 8 months.  All of them are dependent on her and her partner for their education and food.  They live in their own house where they do everything possible to offer them a better quality of life.  She sells used clothing on the highway at kilometer 86 as well as to the people who live by the water and who pay her with animals.  She has been doing this for 10 years and says that it’s going well.  However, she now has a newborn and she can’t travel, so she is thinking about starting a business that can be in her house and would allow her to get income without taking risks by traveling far.  
With this in mind she is planning on opening a general store that she hopes will do well.  Now all her hopes are set on this new business that she wants to start.  This will be her 14th loan with MFP.  She is a good group member and is known as being punctual and collaborative with the others.  She hope to continue working together now that, thanks to the loans, she has had a  lot of support in her investment and to be able to increase her working capital.  She will use the money requested to buy merchandise for her store, as well as for purchasing some shelving and groceries to start her new project.

loans.use: to buy products such as shelving for her displays

loans.name: Amparito Manuelita

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Nueva Kenedy se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Amparito, tiene 42 años de edad, está separada y de esta relación tienen dos hijas de 20 y 16 años de edad, la mayor está casada y la menor vive con ella y estudian en colegio.
 
Nuestra amiga para poder salir adelante con sus hijas después de que se divorcio empezó un negocio en su casa, allí instalo con los pocos recursos que tenía un pequeño restaurante y con el paso de los días ha ido ampliando y mejorando para brindar un gran servicio a sus clientes, allí trabaja de lunes a sábado desde las 6h00 hasta las 15h00, ella prepara desayunos, almuerzos y platos a la carta, nos cuenta que gracias a este negocio ha logrado salir adelante y ayudar a sus hijas. Con ella trabaja una chica a quien le paga un sueldo mensual.

Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar arroz, carne, pescado y otros víveres para la preparación de los alimentos. Este es el primer ciclo en el Banco Comunal  y le gusta por la rapidez con que salen los créditos.
 
Su meta es seguir adelante en su negocio.
texts.en:
The “New Kennedy” communal bank meets every two weeks in Montecristi Canton that’s known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its crafts that are recognized both nationally and internationally.  It’s where the famous straw hats come from.

We met Amparito, 42, here.  She’s separated and has two daughters who are 20 and 16 years old.  The oldest one is married and the younger one still lives with her and is going to school.

In order to get ahead with her daughters after her divorce, our friend started a home-based business.  She used the few resources she had to open a small restaurant and as time has passed has been expanding and improving it to provide great customer service.  She works there Monday through Saturday from 6am until 3pm.  She makes breakfasts, lunches and a la carte dishes.  She tells us that thanks to this business she’s managed to get ahead and help her daughters.  A young woman works with her that she pays a monthly salary to.

She will use this loan to buy rice, meat, fish and other foodstuffs to prepare the meals.  This is the first cycle in the communal bank and she likes it because of the speed with which the loans are approved.  Her goal is to stay in business.

loans.use: to buy rice, meat, fish and other foodstuffs.

loans.name: María Marlene

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Nueva Kenedy se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

La señora María es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta por la ayuda que le han dado a través de estos créditos. Tiene  43 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos los cuales ya son mayores de edad pero que aún viven con ella. Su esposo es comerciante.

Nuestra amiga junto al esposo se dedican a la venta de frutas y legumbres en el mercado de Montecristi, nos cuenta nuestra amiga que ellos muy de mañana se van hasta el mercado a comprar a comerciantes mayoristas y una vez que tienen los productos arman un pequeño puesto en el mercado a la espera de que lleguen los clientes a abastecerse de estos productos básicos en la alimentación de las personas. Llevan 8 años dedicados a esta actividad y esto le ha servido para sacar a su familia adelante.
	
Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar legumbres, verduras y frutas.
 
Su meta es tener una gran tienda de víveres.
texts.en:
The “New Kennedy” communal bank meets every two weeks in Montecristi Canton that’s known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its crafts that are recognized both nationally and internationally.  It’s where the famous straw hats come from.

María, 43, is a founding member of the communal bank and she likes it because of the help she’s gotten through these loans.  She’s married and has three children who are all adults now but still live with her.  Her husband’s a merchant.

She works with her husband selling fruit and vegetables in Montecristi’s market.  Our friend tells us that they go to the market very early to buy from wholesalers and once they have their products they set up a small stand in the market and await their customers who come by to stock up on these basic items in people’s diets.  They’ve been in this line of work for 8 years and it’s allowed them to support their family.

She will use this loan to buy fruit and vegetables.  Her goal is to have a large food store.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Jose Francisco

texts.es:
Don Jose, de 42 años de edad, es originario de la ciudad de León , esta casado ,padre de dos hijos, el es técnico automotriz, el es dueño de un pequeño taller de soldadura en general. Desde los 15 años de edad, se dedico a la pintura de carro actividad que aprendió en un taller después  aprendió a soldar y fue ahí que decidió tener propio taller de soldadura hoy en día tiene mas de 20 años  de tener su taller .
El realizo este préstamo para compra de materiales para soldadura tales como hierro, platina, angulares, discos, electrodos. Esta inversión le permitirá trabajar con más material, disponer de el de manera inmediata y poder cumplir con su trabajo más eficientemente. Dentro de sus planes futuros quiere comprar una maquina soldador de metaso, remodelar su taller compra mas herramientas modernas para trabajar, buscando el bienestar de su familia que es su objetivo principal.
texts.en:
José, 42, is originally from the city of León.  He’s married and the father of two children.  He’s an auto mechanic and owns a small general welding shop.  Since the age of 15 he’s been painting cars, a skill he learned working in a shop.  Later on he learned how to weld and that’s when he decided to have a welding shop of his own.  To date, he’s had his own shop for more than 20 years.

He took out this loan to buy welding supplies like iron, chrome, metal angles, discs, electrodes.  This investment will make it possible to work with more material and to have it on hand to respond to work orders efficiently.  Part of his future plans is to buy a welding machine, to remodel his shop and to buy more modern work tools seeking to attain his family’s wellbeing which is his main objective.

loans.use: to buy welding supplies.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es:
Nilda, D. 58 años, es una mujer amable y muy responsable, esta casada y tiene seis hijos quienes ya son mayores y solo dos viven con ella, un hijo D. 30 años, y su hija D. 26 años,  quien es madre soltera y vive ahí con su hijo. Juntos habitan en su casa propia que pudo comprar junto a su esposo para poder educar y criar a sus hijos.
El trabajo D. Nilda consiste en la venta D. abarrotes al por menor, ella se dedica al menudeo, tiene 15 años ejerciendo éste trabajo y gracias a ello logró educar a sus hijos e implementar muchas cosas en su casa. Asimismo posee la ayuda D. su hija, pero generalmente trabaja sola. Lo que le gusta D. su trabajo es que  nunca deja D. tener clientes, gana un buen porcentaje en sus venta y eso hace que tenga ingresos regulares, por ahora ella prefiere mantenerse con lo que tiene y mas adelante poder ampliar un poco más su negocio. Este será el crédito diez con MFP, y considera que le gusta trabajar con su grupo, ya que son muy responsables, y espera poder seguir trabajando bien como hasta ahora, asimismo está muy agradecida con su ayuda anterior y espera seguir trabajando juntos nuevamente. Con el monto solicitado, comprará mercadería y productos para su bodega y asi abastecerse D. más productos.
texts.en:
Nilda, 58, is a kind, very responsible woman.  She’s married and has six children who are all adults now, just two of them still live with her, a 30-year-old son and her 26-year-old daughter who is a single mother and lives there with her son.  They all live together in their own house that she and her husband were able to buy to educate and raise their children.

Nilda’s work consists in selling groceries at retail.  She’s a retailer.  She’s been in business for 15 years and thanks to it was able to educate her children and furnish her house with many things.  Her daughter helps her out but mostly she works alone.  What she likes about her work is that she never lacks customers.  She earns a good percentage on her sales and this causes her to have a regular income.  For now, she prefers to support herself with what she has and later on be able to enlarge her business a bit more.

This will be her tenth MFP loan and she feels that she likes to work with her group because they are very responsible and she hopes to continue working well like she’s done to date.  She is also very grateful for the previous help and hopes to continue to work together again.  She will use the requested amount to buy merchandise and products for her store in order to stock up on more products.

loans.use: to buy more stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Gonzalo

texts.es: El Sr. Gonzalo es una  persona  responsable  y  muy  trabajadora que se  dedica  a  realizar   trabajos  de  plomería , el  día  con día se  preocupa  por  el   bienestar  de  su  hogar   es por  ello que  acudió con nosotros  para    que lo apoyemos  en    la realización de su proyecto, el cual  consiste   en  colocar  la   losa de concreto para  su  vivienda, agradece  el  apoyo  brindado, ya que  ve  en el crédito la posibilidad  de   ofrecer  a su   familia  una  excelente   calidad  de   vida obteniendo  una  mayor  comodidad.
texts.en: Gonzalo is a responsible, very hardworking person who does plumbing jobs.  He strives daily to provide wellbeing for his home and this is why he’s called upon us so that we will support his project that consists in installing concrete flooring in his house.  He is grateful for the support provided since he sees in the loan the possibility to provide his family with an excellent quality of life obtaining greater comfort.

loans.use: to install flooring in his house.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan, expresa su agradecimiento primeramente por el apoyo recibido de Kiva atravez del préstamo ya que con el pudo comprar insumos para su siembra de frijoles, fueron muy buenas ganancias aunque no las esperadas ya que se le presento plagas pero aun así vendió parte de su cosecha. Ahora quiere seguir sembrando para el siguiente ciclo y por eso esta solicitando este segundo préstamo para sembrar y dar mantenimiento a su siembra de frijoles ya que se acerca una época buen para las cosechas de granos básicos y se puede comercializar a precios justos que le permitan obtener ingresos que le permitan seguir sembrando y luchando cada día por el bienestar de su familia.
texts.en:
First of all, Juan wants to express his thanks for the support he got from Kiva through the loan because he was able to buy farming supplies for his bean crops.  Profits were very good although not quite as expected because infestations affected his crops; even so, he was able to sell part of his harvest.  

Now, he’d like to continue planting in the next cycle so is asking for a second loan to plant and care for his bean crop since a good season for basic grains is approaching and they can be sold for fair prices that make it possible to earn income that will allow him to continue to plant and to strive each day for his family’s wellbeing.

loans.use: To buy supplements and fertilizer to treat 1 1/2 parcels of irrigated beans

loans.name: Maria Erlinda

texts.es: La señorita Maria Erlinda, es una persona de 25 años de edad de estado civil soltera, alcanzo a estudiar una carrera técnica (auxiliar en enfermería), vive habitualmente en la casa de sus padres que está ubicado en la comunidad de Iluri Garante - Tíraque y no cuenta con dependientes económicos a cargo; su actividad económica es el servicio que brinda con su profesión en el Hospital Central de la población de Ivirgazama por el cual tiene una remuneración mensual. Finalmente la clienta manifiesta tener ganas de superarse y para tal efecto se ve en la necesidad de solicitar capital de inversión para realizar la compra de un lote (terreno) para que posteriormente pueda construir en ella su casa y de tal forma mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
María Erlinda, 25 years old and single, was able to study in a technical program (nursing assistant).  She usually lives in her parents' house, located in the community of Iluri Garante - Tíraque, and has no dependents to care for.  Her economic activity is the professional service she offers in the Hospital Central, for which she receives a monthly salary.

María Erlinda says she wants to improve herself, and for that she sees the need to request investment capital to buy a piece of property so that later she can build a house and, in this way, improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a piece of property.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase ingredients to make Mexican candies.

loans.name: Naranbaatar

texts.en:
Naranbaatar is 31 years old and lives with his two children and wife in a house in the Hentii province of Mongolia. One daughter goes to school and the other one goes to kindergarten. His wife is unemployed. 

He started his business in 2009 by driving a taxi in the local town. He used to drive an old car. With his business profits, he purchased a Japanese car. He mainly goes for a taxi call service which brings him a quite sufficient amount of income. His income is the main financial source for this family. 

He is a diligent and open-minded man who says "I have many friends from my work. I feel good when people say 'Thank You' while getting out of the taxi." He is requesting a 1,000,000 Tugrik (MNT) loan to purchase spare parts for his car.

loans.use: To purchase spare parts

loans.name: Sarita

texts.en:
Sarita is 46 years old.  She is married and has two children aged 22 and 19.  In 2001, she established  her grocery store business.  Working 7 days a week and 12 hours a day, she supports her family.  She has already received and successfully repaid one loan from Patan BPW and used it to buy grocery goods.  In the future, Sarita plans to uplift the economic condition of her family.  She thanks you for your support.


In the Kathmandu Valley, small grocery stores, called "pasal", are an important part of the local economy.  Fresh produce, milk, and staples such as rice, lentils, and flour are purchased daily for cooking in the home.  Owners of small grocery stores use Kiva loans to increase their purchasing power and profit margins.  By keeping inventory strong and purchasing in larger amounts, owners of these small stores are able to increase profitability.  While a typical "pasal" might be no more than 100 sq. feet, they are always full of bargaining customers, incoming produce, and shrewd businesswomen.

loans.use: to buy grocery goods.

loans.name: Ramita

texts.en:
Ramita is 32 years old.  She is married and has two children aged 6 and 1.  In 2004, she established  her tailoring business.  Working 7 days a week and 8 hours a day, she supports her family.  She has already received and successfully repaid one loan from Patan BPW and used it to buy materials for her tailoring business.  In the future, Ramita plans to uplift the economic condition of her family.  She thanks you for your support. 

In the Kathmandu Valley, clothing is made to order.  Tailor stalls line the streets where store owners sell materials and work their sewing machines.  These skilled tailors make school uniforms for children as well as the the traditional women's "kurta surwal" and men's "daura surwal".  With a Kiva loan, BPW borrowers are able to purchase additional cloth material or sewing machines that will increase production and profitability.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is married with 3 children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Evelyn is 44 years old and still has 1 child who is in school.

Evelyn has a fishing/fish vending business in the Philippines. Evelyn requested a PHP 20,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase fishing gear and equipment. Evelyn has been in this business for 7 years. She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fishing gear and equipment

loans.name: Manohari

texts.en:
A four-storied wooden framed building in the heart of Tangal, a busy district near Kathmandu, is home to this family-run business, ‘Nepalese Wood Craft Child Craft.’ The family has been in the wood craft business for three generations. Over the years, the business has expanded to employ twenty people from the community who have become like a family, according to the business proprietor. She is applying for a Kiva loan to purchase more raw materials to make wooden toys and learning tools for children.

Once a year during the sale season, she sells her products to a number of buyers, including non-profit organizations such as “Save the Children” and “Room to Read.” Many of these products help children learn to read and count, while some products, such as the rocking horse, are meant for entertainment. For rest of the year, Manohari is busy overseeing the preparation of stock for the next season.

The factory works at every stage of the production line - from cutting through the first grain of wood for making a rocking horse or a jigsaw puzzle to varnishing a toy with final paint. The Kiva loan will help Manohari to purchase materials for these processes so that the business can produce more stock in time for the big sale season.

loans.use: to buy wood to craft children's toys and learning tools.

loans.name: Goma

texts.en:
Goma is 60 years old.  She is married and has two children aged 30 and 25.  In 2000, she established  her tea shop business.  Working 7 days a week and 8 hours a day, she supports her family.  She has already received and successfully repaid seven loans from Patan BPW and used her most recent one to buy foodstuffs for her business.  In the future, Goma plans to uplift the economic condition of her family.  She thanks you for your support. As a borrower to improve living standard extra training is needed.

Whether on the streets of Kathmandu or in the villages outside of the capital, tea shops are places of business and meeting in Nepal.  Called a "chiya pasal," these tea shops make a sweet, milky tea that can be purchased for a few cents a cup.  With a Kiva loan, BPW's borrowers are able to keep their store shelves stocked while increasing their profit margins by buying in greater volume.

loans.use: to buy foodstuffs.

loans.name: Verlita

texts.en:
Vertila, a 35-year-old married mother of three, all of whom attend school, works very hard to provide for them. The operator of a sari-sari store in the Philippines for three years, she sells a variety of items such as snack food, soap and other groceries.

Vertila has requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell, and in the future would like to save enough money to fund her children's education to college level.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell.

loans.name: Cherry

texts.en:
Cherry is 35 years old and married with three children.

Cherry works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell.

Cherry has borrowed and paid 13 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for ten years and also earns an income from food vending.

Cherry aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is 36 years old and married with 2 children.

Mary Jane works hard to provide for her family. She runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks to sell in her sari-sari store.

Mary Jane has borrowed and paid 2 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the sari-sari store for 2 years and also earns an income from raising pigs.

Mary Jane aspires to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To purchase more stocks to sell in her sari-sari store

loans.name: Merlie

texts.en:
Merlie is 40 years old and married with one child.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Merlie is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy additional piglets and feed for her business.

Merlie has been raising pigs for 2 years and also earns additional income from sari-sari store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: To buy additional piglets and feed for her business

loans.name: Cristita

texts.en:
Cristita works hard to support her family. Cristita is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Cristita requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to purchase more boxes of fish to sell.

Cristita has been in this business for 20 years now.

In the future, Cristita would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: To purchase more boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Nemia

texts.en:
Nemia works hard to support her family. Nemia is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

Nemia requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase a fishing net and other equipments.

Nemia has been in this business for 20 years.

In the future, Nemia would like to save enough money to buy a fishing boat.

loans.use: to purchase a fishing net and other equipment

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Hannah Jean

texts.en:
Hannah Jean is 38 years old and married with two children.

Hannah Jean works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to buy a variety of goods to sell in her store.

Hannah Jean has borrowed and paid 17 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 6 years and also earns an income from selling purified drinking water.

Hannah Jean aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy a variety of goods to sell in her store

loans.name: Esterlita

texts.en:
As a married parent of 2 children, Esterlita works hard to support her family.

She has a fish vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling charcoal. Esterlita is borrowing PHP 19000 through NWTF to buy additional fish to sell for her fish vending business.

Esterlita has been sustaining her business activities through her past 5 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy additional fish to sell

loans.name: Klenile

texts.en:
Klenile is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fishing/fish selling business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 19500 through NWTF to purchase materials for the repair of her motorboat for her fishing/fish selling business.

Klenile has been in this business for 15 years. Klenile earns more income from pig fattening.

Klenile has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to save money to expand her business and to repair her family home.

loans.use: To purchase materials for the repair of her motorboat

loans.name: Mery Estanislada

texts.es:
Mery tiene 43 años de edad, es casada y madre de cuatro hijos, reside en el municipio de La Vega en el departamento de Santa Bárbara, y se dedica a la venta de mercaderia.

Mery inició vendiendo ropa para niños y adultos de forma ambulante y lo hizo por 12 años consecutivos hasta que en el año 2003 pudo obtener su propio local. Aprendió de una de sus primas y actualmente trabaja de manera independiente. Su horario de atencion al cliente inicia desde las 8:00 am y culmina a las 8:00 pm. Para comprar la mercaderia que vende en su pequeña tienda viaja hasta la ciudad de San Pedro Sula porque encuentra precios comodos y de esa manera puede ofrecerles a sus clientes precios baratos. De vez en cuando le va mal con la recuperacion del dinero de la mercaderia que da al credito pero a pesar de eso sigue adelante.

Mery solicita el prestamo para la compra de mercaderia como zapatos, ropa de niños y adultos, sandalias, zapatos, cosmeticos, entre otros productos. Con el apoyo del prestamo ella podrá surtir de mas y variados estilos y sus clientes tendran diferentes opciones para elegir.

Su meta es hacer crecer su negocio y convertir su tienda en una de las mejores de la zona, para tener una vida digna y darle una mejor condicion de vida a sus hijos. Este es su segundo ciclo en FAMA y ha cancelado sus cuotas de forma puntual y espera seguirlo haciendo.
texts.en:
Mery is 43 years old, married, and has four children.  She lives in the town of La Vega in the Santa Barbara department.  She works selling merchandise.

Mery began selling clothing for children and adults as a street vendor.  She did this for twelve years, until 2003, when she was able to obtain her own store.  She learned from one of her cousins and now works on her own.  She serves customers from 8:00am until 8:00pm.  To purchase the merchandise she sells in her small store, she travels to the city of San Pedro Sula because she gets good prices there and she can then offer her customers lower prices.  Once in a while she is not able to recover money for goods bought on credit, but in spite of this, she continues ahead.

Mery is asking for this loan to purchase merchandise such as shoes, clothing for adults and children, sandals, cosmetics, and other products.  With the support of this loan, she will be able to stock more and varied styles and her customers will have more choices.

Her goal is to grow her business and make her store one of the best in the area so that she can have a dignified life and give her children a better way of life.  This is her second loan cycle with FAMA and she has repaid her past loan on time and she hopes to continue doing so.

loans.use: to purchase shoes, clothing, cosmetics, and other items.

loans.name: Lucily

texts.en:
Lucily works hard to support her family. Lucily is married and has a sari sari store business in the Philippines.

Lucily requested a PHP 13000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries etc. in her sari sari store.

Lucily has been in this business for 5 years now.

In the future, Lucily would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy items to sell in her sari sari store

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma is married with 3 children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Vilma is 40 years old and has 2 children who are in school.

Vilma has a used clothes business in the Philippines. Vilma requested a PHP 13000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase additional bundles of used clothes to sell.

Vilma has been in this business for 22 years. In the future, Vilma would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional bundles of used clothes to sell

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is 51 years old and has 2 children. Erlinda is married and has 2 children who are in school.

Erlinda is in the agricultural business raising chickens in the Philippines. Erlinda requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy feeds and vitamins for her chickens.

Erlinda has been raising chickens for seven years now, and has borrowed 12 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Erlinda would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and vitamins for her chickens

loans.name: Estelita

texts.en:
Estelita is 41 years old and married with 3 children. With one child in school, Estelita works very hard to provide for them.

Estelita buys and sells rice in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell.

Estelita has been in this business for 6 years.

In the future Estelita would like to save enough to build a house for her family.

loans.use: To buy additional sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Roxana Marínela

texts.es: Roxana Marínela D. cuarenta y tres años D. edad vive con su compañero D. vida y sus hijos en su humilD. casa que con mucho esfuerzo es propia en zona urbana y cercana a la capital del país. Ella se dedica a la venta D. platos plásticos, frutas y verduras frescas en su misma casa, es muy  conocida en el lugar donD. resiD. y se ha hecho D. mucha clientela pues siempre tiene lo que las personas necesitan con producto D. muy buena calidad y a precios increiblemente accesibles; Roxana es una mujer decidida que le gusta el trabajo y mira la vida como la oportunidad D. invertir cada día,  es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar platos plásticos, tomates, ajos, cebollas, chiles, guineos y fruta D. temporada a fin D. incrementar su inventario o suplir productos que sus clientes últimamente demandan y por falta D. recurso propio no ha podido comprar. Roxana Marínela tiene la esperanza que así tendrá la oportunidad D. llevar a su hogar seguridad económica y forjar un mejor futuro para su querida familia.
texts.en:
43-year old Roxana Marínela lives with her husband and children in a simple house they worked hard to buy. It is located in a suburb near the capital city. Roxana earns her living selling plastic items as well as fresh fruit and vegetables from her home. She is well known in the area and has many customers because she always has what they want. The products are of good quality and a fair price. 

Roxana is a determined woman who enjoys work. She sees life as a daily opportunity to be seized, and for this reason she is seeking a loan from INTEGRAL to buy plastic dishes, tomatoes, garlic, onions, chiles, guineos (green bananas), and whatever fruit is in season. These purchases will allow her to increase her stock and proviD. what her customers have recently been asking for. She hasn't been able to afford to buy them herself.

Roxana hopes that the loan will give her the opportunity to proviD. a steady income and a better future for her beloved family.

loans.use: to buy plastic dishes, tomatoes, garlic, onions, chiles, mangos etc.

loans.name: Leonida

texts.en:
Leonida is 32 years old and married with 3 children. With 3 children in school, Leonida works very hard to provide for them.

Leonida buys and sells dried fish in the Philippines and requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks of dried fish to sell.

Leonida has been in this business for 12 years.

In the future Leonida would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: To buy additional stocks of dried fish to sell

loans.name: Nancy

texts.en:
Nancy is 47 years old and married with 4 children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur.

Nancy has a Sari Sari Store business in the Philippines. Nancy requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more items to sell.

Nancy has been in this business for 2 years. Nancy would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more items to sell

loans.name: Jacqueline Lisette

texts.es: Jacqueline Lisette de veinticuatro años de edad vive con su madre al norte del país en uno de los municipios populosos y consecuentemente muy buenos para comercializar, ella posee una panadería desde hace cuatro años, la que es muy conocida en la localidad donde reside pues prepara el mejor pan del lugar y en variedad  dulce y salado: alfajores, cachitos, salpores, semita, torta de fruta, entre  otros. Se situa en una de las calles donde transitan muchas personas que se convierten en clientes potenciales, quienes la prefieren porque sus productos finales son de excelente calidad y a precios bajos; La mañana de Jacqueline inicia a las 4 de la mañana y lográr hornear el pan frances que día a día envía a través de un repartidor a tiendas y clientes fijos cercanos a su residencia, es una mujer emprendedora en definitiva, piensa mucho en su madre que por su avanzada edad ya no puede trabajar y es lo que a ella le inspira día a día; realmente ella dice disfrutar mucho de esta actividad, además espera poder algún día poder pagarse un curso o capacitación en panificación con el que pueda mejorar su actividad productiva, además comprar insumos como harina, huevos, levadura, azúcar, leche y mantequilla, para poder cubrir el incremento de demanda que últimamente han hecho sus clientes; el no contar con recurso propio es lo que ha hecho que se acerque a la mano amiga de INTEGRAL para adquirir un crédito que le permita comprar los insumos dichos. Jacqueline Lisette tiene fe que su trabajo le dará la oportunidad de darle a su mamá una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
24-year old Jacqueline Lisette lives with her mother in the north of the country in a densely population area which is consequently very good for business. She has run a bakery for four years. It is well known as Jacqueline makes the best bread in the area as well as a variety of sweet and savoury items: alfajores, croissants, scones, semitas (tart of bread dough filled with jam), fruit tarts etc. The bakery is located in a busy street where many passers by are regular customers because of her excellent baking and low prices. 

Jacqueline starts work at 4am daily when she bakes French loaves ready for a delivery person to take them to stores and regular clients near her home. In short, she is an enterprising person, inspired by her elderly mother who can no longer work because of her age. She truly enjoys her work.

She hopes one day to be able to afford to take a course or some training in bread-making so that she can improve her products. She now wants to buy supplies such as flour, eggs, yeast, sugar, milk and butter so she can fulfill her customers' orders. As she doesn't have any money of her own, she is seeking a helping hand from INTEGRAL and asking for a loan to buy the above items. Jacqueline Lisette is certain that her business will give her the opportunity to provide her mother with a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as flour, eggs, yeast, sugar, milk and butter

loans.name: Gladis Noemí

texts.es: Gladis Noemí de treinta y nueve años de edad vive con su compañero de vida y sus hijos. Ella posee una sala de belleza y una venta de productos de uso personal o de uso para estudiantes como crayones, cartulina, cuadernos, ganchos para el cabello, colas, la ganancia que adquiere de la venta de todos estos productos y el servicio que presta es su única fuente de ingresos con la que ayuda al sostenimiento en su hogar, se ha hecho de mucha clientela pues el servicio que presta a sus clientes es excelente, realiza los mejores cortes, alisados, y planchados; además los artículos que vende son de muy buena calidad y todo es a precios accesibles, Gladis es una mujer emprendedora para ella la vida es un desafío diario y está dispuesta a enfrentarlo es por eso que le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cosméticos, cremas, shampo, acondicionador entre otros con los que no cuenta y se hayan demandando sus clientes. De esta forma Gladis Noemí tiene confianza que logrará darle a su familia seguridad económica y un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Gladis Noemí, age 39, lives with her life partner and her children. She has a beauty salon and sells personal care products as well as schools supplies, such as crayons, construction paper, notebooks, hair clips, and glue. Her earnings from these sales and her services are her sole source of income, which she puts toward providing for her household.
